translation.en: [boy] So, there my grandfather was. Alone, injured,
translation.zh: ‎当时我爷爷一个人 受了伤

translation.en: scared, in space.
And the only way he could survive until his crew came back to rescue him
translation.zh: ‎要坚持到队员们回来营救他

translation.en: was by growing vegetables… in his own poop.
translation.zh: ‎唯一的办法是用自己的大便种蔬菜

translation.en: OK, Kevin... I'm gonna stop you right there.
translation.zh: ‎好的 凯文 ‎我得让你停了

translation.en: I'm having a hard time believing this is true.
translation.zh: ‎很难相信你说的这些是真的

translation.en: Mrs. Westenfeldt, I don't know what would make you think--
translation.zh:
‎韦斯特费尔德太太
‎不知你为什么会这么觉得

translation.en: Well, for one thing, it's the plot of The Martian.
translation.zh: ‎首先 这是《火星救援》的桥段

translation.en: -[boy 1] Come on. -[boy 2] Enough already, Kev.
Where do you think they got the idea?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得他们的灵感是从哪儿来的呢？

translation.en: ♪ No more hangin' round Wonderin' what to do in town ♪
[whispers] My God. Oh, my God.
Clancy?
Is your head OK?
-Uh, hey, Travis. -[chuckles] Uh, yeah, I'm fine.
translation.zh: ‎你好 特拉维斯 嗯 我没事

translation.en: So, I'm having this party tonight.
My parents are out of town. You should come by. Here, um…
translation.zh: ‎我父母出城去了 你来吧 这样

translation.en: -Give me your number, so I can-- -Oh, um, I don't have that.
translation.zh:
‎-你的号码给我 我就可以…
‎-噢 我没有

translation.en: -You don't have a number? -No. [chuckles] I don't have a phone.
translation.zh:
‎-你没有号码？
‎-是的 我没有手机

translation.en: -[chuckles] -My mom won't let me.
She thinks social media's where serial killers
translation.zh: ‎她觉得社交媒体上有连环杀手

translation.en: and college admissions get their information about you.
translation.zh:
‎觉得大学招生处
‎是从社交媒体了解你的信息

translation.en: [chuckles] That's… That's really weird.
Yeah.
-[girl] Hey, Trav. -Hey, Emma.
translation.zh:
‎-你好 特拉
‎-你好 艾玛

translation.en: Your party is going to be wicked awesome.
Oh, and shouldn't you be in rehearsal, band nerd?
translation.zh: ‎还有 你不要参加乐队排练吗？

translation.en: [Travis] Don't worry about them. They're annoying.
translation.zh: ‎哎 别管她们 很烦人

translation.en: Hope I see you tonight.
[teacher] Louisa, thank you. Violin sounded excellent.
translation.zh: ‎路易莎 非常感谢 小提琴拉得非常好

translation.en: Alright, guys, practice, practice. [clapping]
Alright. Bye, kids.
-Great job today, Clancy. -Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-今天表现非常好 克兰西
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Did you finish your... your audition tape?
Um, not yet.
Not yet? Clancy, the application deadline is in two weeks.
translation.zh:
‎还没有？克兰西
‎还有两周 申请就截止了

translation.en: I know, I… [sighs] I filmed one last night, but I deleted it,
translation.zh:
‎我知道 昨晚我录了一遍
‎不过我删掉了

translation.en: 'cause at ends, I was a little pitchy, and the high notes were flat. I…
translation.zh:
‎因为最后有点不太好
‎高音调太平 我…

translation.en: -I just need-- -Hey, listen... Make the tape this weekend, get it to me by Monday.
translation.zh:
‎哎 听我说 本周末把带子录好
‎周一给我

translation.en: That's it. You got this.
-OK. -OK. You got this.
-[Clancy giggles] -Kids class. You wanna practice? Fine.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 要好好练习 好的

translation.en: Ooh, you look good!
Yeah, I didn't... didn't think I'd see you here. You look fierce. [growls]
translation.zh:
‎对 没想到在这里见到你
‎你非常棒啊

translation.en: [boy 1 chuckles] Nice moves, loser.
-This is so good, man. -[Kevin] It was just a joke.
translation.zh:
‎-太棒了 兄弟
‎-开玩笑罢了

translation.en: -[boy 1] Where you going? Get back here. -[Kevin] Leave me alone.
translation.zh:
‎-去哪里？别这样 兄弟
‎-别跟着我 ‎别走啊 回来

translation.en: Where you going? Come on. Give me one more move.
translation.zh: ‎你去哪里？别这样 再跳一段

translation.en: I knew you were there the whole time. It was just a joke.
translation.zh:
‎我早就知道你在里面
‎就是开玩笑罢了

translation.en: -[boy 1] Youre gonna be famous. -Hey.
-Everything OK here, boys? -Yep. All good.
translation.zh:
‎-没事吧 孩子们？
‎-嗯 没事

translation.en: [boy 2] Sure.
Alright. Why don't you head back to lunch?
Not so fast, you three. You're eighth graders.
translation.zh: ‎慢点 你们三个 ‎你们八年级了

translation.en: You think you should be picking on younger kids?
translation.zh: ‎真觉得应该欺负比你们小的孩子吗？

translation.en: What are you gonna do about it?
Oh... Jeez, well.
I guess, first I would find out who your parents are.
translation.zh: ‎首先 我大概可以查查你们父母是谁

translation.en: Then I'd find out where they live.
And one night,
when you're all sound asleep, I'd cut a small hole in their brake lines.
translation.zh:
‎等你们都熟睡了
‎我可以在他们的刹车线上切一个小洞

translation.en: So, one minute you've got brakes, and the next,
translation.zh: ‎这样一开始可以刹车 但是之后

translation.en: you're rolling right through a stop sign
and getting smashed into little, unrecognizable pieces by oncoming traffic.
Oops! You missed lunch.
Better not be late for class.
-[indistinct chatter] -[boy 1] Guys, wait up!
-Hey, Dad! -Hey!
Hey, guys!
translation.zh: ‎哎 你们好 周五啦 感谢神！

translation.en: TGIF! [chuckles] How was school?
translation.zh:
‎哎 你们好 周五啦 感谢神！ ‎-学校里怎么样？
‎-挺好

translation.en: -Did anything interesting happen? -[both] No.
translation.zh:
‎-发生什么有趣的事了吗？
‎-没有

translation.en: OK.
Dad, you really brought those weird finger things to school?
translation.zh:
‎你真的把这古怪的手指玩意儿
‎带到学校来了？

translation.en: Uh, no, I didn't bring these with me to school, OK?
[chuckles] I have a spare set in the car.
translation.zh: ‎只是在车上放了一个备用罢了

translation.en: -That's even weirder. -Kevin, can you tell your sister
translation.zh:
‎-那就更奇怪了
‎-凯文 能不能告诉你姐

translation.en: that being a pastry chef
translation.zh: ‎做糕点主厨需要巨大的手指力量？

translation.en: requires enormous finger strength for kneading dough?
translation.zh: ‎做糕点主厨需要巨大的手指力量？ ‎要捏面团 看看这肌肉

translation.en: -Look at that muscle. [groans] -Yeah, look at it. He's the finger ninja.
translation.zh: ‎要捏面团 看看这肌肉 ‎对 看看 他是手指忍者

translation.en: -Hola. What's goin' on, Finch family? -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-你们好 还好吧 芬奇一家？
‎-你好

translation.en: [girl] Thanks for always letting me catch a ride, Mr. Finch.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你顺路带我 芬奇先生

translation.en: -[Dad] You're basically family, Mim. -Don't be a perv! Close the door.
translation.zh: ‎没事 咱们基本上是一家人了 小米 ‎别吐出来 关门

translation.en: Well, looks like we're all here. Let's hit it, Dad.
translation.zh: ‎看来都到齐了 出发吧 爸

translation.en: I'd love to, but I can't jump the line.
translation.zh: ‎我也想开 不过在排队 凯文

translation.en: Yeah, it's just, idling like this is super bad for the environment.
translation.zh: ‎爸 这样缓行对环境特别不好

translation.en: Oh... Do you have to take a number two?
Dad, what? No!
No, I'm just saying. I know you don't like going in school,
translation.zh:
‎我就是问问嘛
‎我知道你不愿意在学校上

translation.en: and I remembered last year,
translation.zh:
‎我就是问问嘛
‎我知道你不愿意在学校上 ‎我记得去年你憋了五天

translation.en: when you held it in for five days, and finally...
translation.zh: ‎我记得去年你憋了五天 ‎后来拉的时候真的是…

translation.en: Dad, stop! You're killing me!
I'm killing you? You were killing us, when you--
translation.zh: ‎我要你命？是你要我们的命 你…

translation.en: Hey!
-Mr. Finch… -Hey, Mrs. W.
You know what I just realized?
translation.zh:
‎我刚发现
‎韦太太和韦斯特费尔德太太

translation.en: Mrs. W and Mrs. Westenfeldt have the same amount of syllables,
translation.zh:
‎我刚发现
‎韦太太和韦斯特费尔德太太 ‎读起来花的时间也差不多

translation.en: so me calling you "Mrs. W"
doesn't save any time. -Isn't that funny? -Ha-ha.
-She doesn't care. -It's funny to me.
translation.zh:
‎-爸 她没觉得好笑
‎-我觉得挺好笑

translation.en: Mr. Finch, Kevin gave a very interesting oral presentation
translation.zh: ‎芬奇先生 今天社会学课上 ‎凯文作了非常有趣的演讲

translation.en: in social studies class today.
Really? It was a project on their family history
and Kevin had fascinating things to say about your family.
translation.zh: ‎凯文说了许多关于你们家族的奇妙事

translation.en: Oh, well--
And how they were a troupe of traveling Russian acrobats turned astronauts
translation.zh: ‎一群旅行的俄国杂技演员变的宇航员

translation.en: -NASA trained for secret space missions. -That--
translation.zh:
‎由美国宇航军训练
‎用于参加秘密太空任务

translation.en: Kevin tends to live in his own imaginary little world,
translation.zh:
‎-这…
‎-凯文喜欢活在自己想象的小世界中

translation.en: -which can be great… -Yes.
…except when it comes at the expense of participating in real life.
translation.zh: ‎但是不能放到现实生活中来

translation.en: Except then.
So... I will give him the weekend to redo his project.
translation.zh:
‎所以 我会给他周末的时间
‎让他重做项目

translation.en: -That seems fair. -[Mrs. W] He can present again on Monday.
translation.zh:
‎-挺公平
‎-他可以周一重新演讲

translation.en: -Hm. -Well, I appreciate that. And she's gone.
Alright. Everybody, buckle up, the correct way.
translation.zh: ‎好的 大家系好安全带 正确系带

translation.en: -[Kevin] Who puts ketchup on pizza? -[Dad] OK, Kevin. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎-在她的披萨上放番茄酱
‎-好的 凯文

translation.en: -Hey, hon! -Hey, guys.
[Dad] You should've seen me. I was a tiger in the carpool line.
translation.zh:
‎你要是看见就好了
‎今天我在共乘车道可威风了

translation.en: [Mom] You are the king of carpool.
[Dad] Guess what. I had a chat with Mrs. W.
translation.zh: ‎今天我又和韦太太有趣地聊了一下

translation.en: -Kevin's at it again. -Kevin, are you telling tales again?
translation.zh: ‎今天我又和韦太太有趣地聊了一下 ‎凯文 你是不是又编故事了？

translation.en: -How was lunch duty today? -[Mom] You know, same as usual.
translation.zh:
‎-哎 今天午餐值日怎么样？
‎-你知道的 和平常一样

translation.en: Actually, an 8th grader got into trouble with his phone. I had--
translation.zh:
‎一个八年级生用手机惹了点麻烦
‎所以我只能…

translation.en: Wow! An 8th grader has a phone, and I don't.
translation.zh: ‎哇！八年级生有手机 我却没有

translation.en: Mom, can we talk about this? Please. It's time. I need a phone.
translation.zh:
‎-来 朋友
‎-妈 能谈一下这事吗？ ‎求你了 是时候了 我需要手机

translation.en: I'm literally the only one in my grade without one. I'm a total freak.
translation.zh:
‎我真的是全年级唯一没有手机的人
‎我成了彻底的怪人

translation.en: Just 'cause you don't have a phone, doesn't make you a freak.
translation.zh: ‎噢 没有手机并不会使你成为怪人

translation.en: Mmm... It's not like "sit with the counselor at lunch 'cause you stink like cheese" freak, but--
translation.zh: ‎虽然算不上像臭奶酪一样臭那么离谱

translation.en: You know, in high school we had this foreign exchange student
translation.zh:
‎-但是…
‎-我们高中有个交换生 有奶酪的臭味

translation.en: who smelled like cheese. We called him Frankie Fromage.
translation.zh:
‎-但是…
‎-我们高中有个交换生 有奶酪的臭味 ‎我们叫他奶酪弗兰基

translation.en: -[Mom laughs] -Ew, Dad! Mom!
-He liked it. Frankie Fromage. -Focus! Phone.
translation.zh:
‎-他还挺喜欢 奶酪弗兰基
‎-别打岔 手机

translation.en: Honey, we've been over this. What do you need a phone for?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 咱们谈过了 你要手机干嘛？

translation.en: Travis Schultz asked for her number to invite her to his party.
translation.zh:
‎特拉维斯·舒尔茨问她要号码 ‎邀请她去参加派对
‎知道这是什么意思吗？

translation.en: Do you know what that means? He's a senior.
translation.zh:
‎邀请她去参加派对
‎知道这是什么意思吗？ ‎他高三了 高三

translation.en: [whispers] Senior.
Wait, a senior? Who? What? -Travis who? What party? -[Mim] Hmm?
translation.zh:
‎等等 高三？哪个特拉维斯？
‎什么派对？

translation.en: What? No. What party? No parties.
translation.zh: ‎什么？没有 什么派对？没有派对

translation.en: -[mouths] Sorry. -Are his parents be there?
-Oh my God. I don't know, Mom. -[Dad] We can call his parents.
translation.zh:
‎-神啊！我不知道 妈
‎-我们可以给他父母打电话

translation.en: We should call his parents.
translation.zh: ‎我们应该给他父母打 都打一下

translation.en: -We should call everybody. -Oh my God. Don't do that.
translation.zh: ‎我们应该给他父母打 都打一下 ‎神啊！不要

translation.en: Absolutely not. Do not call anybody. That's so embarrassing.
translation.zh: ‎绝对不要 不要打电话 太丢人了

translation.en: Honey, listen...
I know you think I don't get it, but I was 15 once too.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你觉得我不懂
‎但我也有过15岁

translation.en: I know a thing or two about parties.
-[snorts] Really? -Yeah.
All you ever talk about is how you spent every waking moment in the library.
translation.zh: ‎你总是说你把时间都花在图书馆了

translation.en: Yeah, well, you know, parties came and went,
but the library was always there for me.
translation.zh: ‎但图书馆总是在那里等着我

translation.en: [sighs] You're about to quote your dead poet guy.
translation.zh: ‎你马上就要引用逝去的诗人了

translation.en: -"There are no strangers here, just…" -[both] "Friends you haven't met."
translation.zh:
‎-没有陌生人
‎-只有你还没认识的朋友

translation.en: William Butler Yeats.
Feel like if you can quote that by heart, you didn't go to a lot of parties.
translation.zh:
‎如果能从内心引用这句的话
‎那确实没有参加很多派对

translation.en: No parents, no parties.
-Come on! Nobody else's mom even cares. -Well, I'm not everyone else's mom.
translation.zh:
‎拜托！别人的妈妈根本不管！ ‎-我可不是别人的妈妈
‎-对 很明显

translation.en: Obviously! Everybody else's moms have a life of their own,
translation.zh:
‎-我可不是别人的妈妈
‎-对 很明显 ‎别人的妈妈都有自己的生活

translation.en: not worrying about what their daughter is doing
translation.zh: ‎不会坐着没事担心女儿在干嘛

translation.en: and the scary things that might happen. [laughs] God, it's pathetic!
translation.zh: ‎担心会发生可怕的事 ‎神啊 太可悲了！

translation.en: -[Dad] Hey. -Oh, so, I'm pathetic?
Yeah. It's sad.
You know what else is sad? You're grounded.
translation.zh: ‎知道什么叫不幸吗？你被禁足了

translation.en: Yeah, you're grounded!
[sighs] She hates me.
Oh, come on, honey…
[sighs] She's ruining my life, Mim.
translation.zh: ‎她在毁掉我的生活 小米

translation.en: -Yeah, baby. She's cray. -[sighs]
She lose it when you told her you were going to Boston for the summer?
translation.zh:
‎你跟她说夏天要去波士顿的时候
‎她有没有发火？

translation.en: -You didn't ask her, did you? -[sighs]
translation.zh:
‎你没和她说 是吧？
‎克兰西 你到底想不想去？

translation.en: -Clancy, do you even wanna go? -Yes, of course! I…
translation.zh:
‎你没和她说 是吧？
‎克兰西 你到底想不想去？ ‎当然想

translation.en: [sighs] I mean, I'm probably not gonna get accepted anyway.
The Berklee Summer Workshop is a really prestigious music program.
translation.zh:
‎伯克利夏季研讨会
‎是非常著名的音乐活动

translation.en: They get a ton of applicants every year and very few get accepted.
translation.zh: ‎每年有大量申请者 很少人能被录取

translation.en: [Mim] Clance...
You're the best cellist I've ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎你是我见过的最棒的大提琴手

translation.en: [scoffs] OK.
I might be the best cellist in our tiny, little corner on Cape Cod.
translation.zh:
‎我也许是鳕鱼角的小角落里
‎最棒的大提琴手

translation.en: Know what I think? You're secretly glad your mother never lets you go anywhere
translation.zh:
‎知道我怎么想吗？ ‎我觉得你暗自庆幸 ‎你母亲从来不让你去任何地方
‎或做任何事

translation.en: or do anything, 'cause then you don't have to put yourself out there.
translation.zh:
‎你母亲从来不让你去任何地方
‎或做任何事 ‎因为你就不用站出来了

translation.en: Wha... That's so not true.
[Mom] Mim! She's grounded. Time to go.
translation.zh: ‎小米 她被禁足了 该走了

translation.en: -[Clancy sighs] -Great.
Then prove it.
We are sneaking out to Travis's party tonight.
translation.zh:
‎咱们今晚溜出去
‎参加特拉维斯的派对

translation.en: -Mi-- -[Mim] Shh! Yes. Yes.
Put on your skinny jeans and your red tank.
translation.zh: ‎穿上修身牛仔裤和红色紧身衣

translation.en: -Love you. -[Clancy] Love you, too.
-[Dad] Angus, stop! Angus! Calm down! -[dog barking]
translation.zh: ‎别动 停下！安格斯 坐下！

translation.en: -[dog barking] -[Dad] Sit. Heel! Heel! Heel!
[yelps] Ah, he got me! Get down! Lay down!
Stay! I'm the alpha!
-Hey, Lewis. What's happenin'? -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-哎 路易斯 你好啊
‎-你好

translation.en: Kevin's is very excited about tonight's sleepover.
translation.zh: ‎凯文对今晚的留宿派对很兴奋

translation.en: Thanks for inviting him.
-Here's a bag with some of his stuff. -Great.
translation.zh:
‎-这个袋子里有他的东西
‎-好的

translation.en: [woman] Including his special nighttime underpants,
which have sensors that sound a small alarm
translation.zh:
‎上面有感应器
‎如果湿了会发出小声警报

translation.en: -when they get wet. -Ah. That's cute.
translation.zh:
‎上面有感应器
‎如果湿了会发出小声警报 ‎不错

translation.en: Lewis has a bit of a problem with [whispers] wetting the bed.
Mom!
Oh, don't worry about it, buddy. It happens to the best of 'em.
translation.zh: ‎哎 别担心 小伙子 很多小孩都这样

translation.en: It happens to me from time to time. [laughs]
Ron! Get your prostate checked.
translation.zh: ‎罗恩 去检查一下前列腺

translation.en: Oh, no, I was, I was…
Ye... I will. I should.
translation.zh:
‎好的 应该去 确实应该去
‎我会去的

translation.en: -I definitely should. I will. Uh, K-Kevin! -Uh-huh.
translation.zh:
‎好的 应该去 确实应该去
‎我会去的 ‎凯文！路易斯来了

translation.en: Lewis is here!
-Come down. Quickly. Like the wind, boy. -[footsteps]
translation.zh: ‎下来吧 赶紧的 风的速度 孩子

translation.en: [chuckles] Come on, buddy. -[dog barking] -No.
-[woman] Bye, honey! Be careful. -[Kevin] Let's go!
translation.zh:
‎-再见 亲爱的 小心一点
‎-走吧

translation.en: Those guys are like the three musketeers, without, you know, the--
translation.zh: ‎这些孩子就像三个火枪手 不过没有…

translation.en: I'll collect him in the morning.
-Eight o'clock sharp. -OK.
He'll be fine.
Right at the video games.
How about you guys do something a bit more, uh, productive?
We are! We just took over Tilted Town.
translation.zh: ‎我们在做啊 我们刚拿下斜镇

translation.en: I meant something a little more physical.
-My guy's running. -[Ron laughs]
OK, Kevin, I think that this is what Mrs. W was talking about.
translation.zh: ‎好的 凯文 我想韦太太说的就是这个

translation.en: You spend way too much time in these imaginary worlds.
translation.zh: ‎你在虚幻世界花了太多时间

translation.en: Why don't you go outside into the real world and run around a bit?
translation.zh: ‎不如去外面 去真实的世界 ‎跑跑步？

translation.en: Oh... Here, Mr. Finch.
-What's this? -A list of my known allergens.
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么？
‎-我已知过敏原的清单

translation.en: It's laminated for protection.
Mom was concerned about your cavalier parenting style.
translation.zh: ‎我妈对你漫不经心的育儿风格很担心

translation.en: -It means-- -I know what it means.
translation.zh:
‎-意思是缺乏…
‎-我知道是什么意思

translation.en: OK. I'll make it simple. How about this? Who wants pizza for dinner?
translation.zh:
‎好的 我简单一点 这样吧？
‎谁晚餐要吃披萨？

translation.en: Me!
-I'm not allowed processed cheeses. -Well, Lewis, it'll be our little secret.
translation.zh:
‎-我！
‎-我不准吃加工过的奶酪 ‎没事的 路易斯 这是咱们的小秘密

translation.en: -I'm not allowed to have secrets. -Oh, it's gonna be a long night.
translation.zh: ‎我不准有秘密 ‎噢 今晚可不轻松

translation.en: Honey, I mean, almond milk, soy milk... Can we just get regular milk for once?
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 杏仁奶 豆奶
‎咱们能不能买一次普通牛奶？

translation.en: You can't just squeeze something and call it milk. -That's just nut water. -[toilet flushing in video]
translation.zh:
‎不能挤点东西就说是牛奶
‎就是坚果水嘛

translation.en: You like nut wa-- What? Wait a minute.
H-honey, honey, I-I gotta go.
Everything OK here, boys?
Oh, crap!
-[dog barking] -Hey! No! Angus, no! Angus! Angus! -Whoa! -No! Stop! No!
translation.zh: ‎哎 别叫！安格斯 别这样！

translation.en: [pizza guy] Here you go, bud. I happen to have a dog treat for ya.
translation.zh: ‎来 小伙子 我刚好有狗粮给你

translation.en: Gotta be prepared for anything in this line of work, man.
translation.zh: ‎做这种工作 什么都要有所准备

translation.en: That was impressive. [laughs]
-What do I owe ya? -Uh, it's gonna be 18.45.
Forty-five. You got it. I have… Oh...
-I only have a twenty. That's a bad tip. -Oh, don't sweat it.
translation.zh:
‎-我只有20美元 小费太少了
‎-噢 没事的

translation.en: No, no, no, I don't wanna be that guy.
Take that, but don't go. Hold on. Take this.
translation.zh:
‎拿好吧 不过先别走
‎等一下 这个拿好

translation.en: I own the bakery on Wyndhurst. Stop by, OK?
translation.zh: ‎我在温胡斯特街有一家面包房 ‎顺路过来 好吗？

translation.en: -Anything you want, on the house. -OK.
-Cool. Thank you, man. -[Ron chuckles] Cool, man.
Nice guy.
[in British accent] It's her.
Wow! You guys picked the perfect night for a campout.
translation.zh: ‎哇！你俩选的日子非常好 ‎很适合露营 一定会很棒！

translation.en: [chuckles] This is gonna be so cool.
translation.zh: ‎很适合露营 一定会很棒！

translation.en: -I don't get why we're being punished. -Kev, you're not being punished.
translation.zh:
‎我不明白为什么要罚我们 ‎凯文 没有罚你们
‎很好玩的 是一次冒险

translation.en: -It's fun. It's an adventure. -Uh, Mr. Finch.
translation.zh:
‎凯文 没有罚你们
‎很好玩的 是一次冒险 ‎芬奇先生 在无人监护的情况下

translation.en: I'm not allowed to play in unfamiliar frontier settings unsupervised.
translation.zh: ‎芬奇先生 在无人监护的情况下 ‎我不准在不熟悉的前线环境玩耍

translation.en: Good news, it's not a frontier. You're in our backyard.
translation.zh: ‎好在这里不是前线 是在我家后院

translation.en: There's a fence. You're gonna be perfectly safe.
translation.zh: ‎有围栏 路易斯 所以你会非常安全

translation.en: Come on, guys. Inside.
There you go. You got it.
Look at this tent. We haven't used this tent in ages.
translation.zh: ‎看看这个帐篷 咱们好久没用过了

translation.en: Yeah, because it sucks! There are bugs everywhere.
translation.zh: ‎对 因为很烂！ ‎到处都是虫 那边在结茧！

translation.en: -That thing's cocooning! -There are not bugs everywhere! Ju... Oh!
translation.zh: ‎到处都是虫 那边在结茧！ ‎没有到处都是虫 只是…

translation.en: There he goes... just back to his little spot, see?
translation.zh: ‎在那里 回到它的地方了 看见没有？

translation.en: Do me a favor. Sleep with your mouths closed, OK?
translation.zh: ‎不过帮个忙 睡的时候闭上嘴 好吧？

translation.en: Anyway, have a good time, guys! This is fun! Camping out!
translation.zh:
‎不管怎样 好好玩 小伙子！
‎露营很好玩的

translation.en: What now?
-We could tell scary stories. -OK.
That sounds cool.
You go first.
What was that?
Air? Wolf? -[crunching] -Badger?
-Probably not a badger. -Alien?
With hooks for hands?
-[Mim laughs] My God! -[Kevin] Jeez, Mim.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 小米！ ‎哎 看你们的脸

translation.en: -[both panting] -[Mim] Oh, you guys should see your faces.
What are you little turds doin' out here?
-S-sleeping in the tent. -Duh. Why?
My dad thinks it's good for us, or something.
[scoffs] Parents are so weird.
[chuckles softly] What are you doing?
Sneaking out, obviously. Cute jammies.
translation.zh: ‎溜出去 很明显嘛 睡衣很可爱

translation.en: -Busted! -[sheepish giggle]
-Sorry, I was just, uh-- -Oh... I know what you were doing.
translation.zh:
‎-不好意思 我只是…
‎-不用说了 我知道你在干嘛

translation.en: You were trying to sneak one of these.
-Yes. [chuckles] -Yes! I know.
Every time
I bake a new tester recipe, there's always one or two missing in the morning.
translation.zh: ‎每次我视作新品 ‎早上都会少掉一两个

translation.en: I always thought it was Kevin, but now I know, it's my daughter.
translation.zh:
‎我一直以为是凯文
‎不过我现在知道了 是我女儿

translation.en: [chuckles] Guilty.
OK... [smacks lips]
Brown sugar, banana, with avocado frosting.
translation.zh: ‎红糖 香蕉 加牛油果糖霜

translation.en: Gettin' crazy, Dad.
A little wild, but tell me what you think.
translation.zh: ‎有点野 说说你觉得味道怎么样

translation.en: You were a little hard on Mom tonight.
She was hard on me. She grounded me for no reason.
translation.zh: ‎是她对我过分 无缘无故对我禁足

translation.en: Well, she had her reasons. You can't talk to Mom like that.
translation.zh:
‎她有她的理由
‎你不能那样对妈妈说话

translation.en: You know, you two are more alike than you know.
translation.zh: ‎你不知道 其实你们俩很像

translation.en: OK.
Alright, enough with the lecture. What do you think? [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎好的 上课上够了 ‎怎么样？

translation.en: -It's actually really good. -Good! I picked the right profession.
translation.zh:
‎很不错 ‎好的 ‎-我选对了职业
‎-对

translation.en: -[laughs] Yeah. -[Ron laughs]
Alright. Well, you finish that one.
-Do not touch any of the other ones. -OK.
-If Kevin asks, you were never here. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎如果凯文问起来 你就说没这事

translation.en: -Alright. Don't stay up too late. -OK.
-Alright. I love you. -Love you, too.
So... where you sneakin' out to?
You sneakin' out to meet a guy? Dude? Man?
Don't tell him anything. He's just gonna tell on us.
translation.zh: ‎什么都别跟他说 ‎他会高我们的密 他是大嘴巴

translation.en: -He's a total tattletale. -I am not!
translation.zh: ‎他会高我们的密 他是大嘴巴 ‎我不是！我们经常溜出去 对吧？

translation.en: And we sneak out all the time, right?
translation.zh: ‎我不是！我们经常溜出去 对吧？

translation.en: You do not sneak out.
-You're too afraid of the dark. -[mouth full] No, we love the dark. Right?
translation.zh: ‎你不溜出去 你怕黑 ‎不 我们喜欢黑 ‎我们喜欢黑 对吧？

translation.en: Says the boy with the Captain America night-light in his room.
Hey, it's not a night-light, it's an area illuminator,
translation.zh: ‎哎 不是夜灯 是区域照明器

translation.en: in case I have to pee or get a drink in the middle of the night.
translation.zh: ‎以防半夜要撒尿或者喝一杯

translation.en: [Clancy] He makes crap up. He's a liar.
translation.zh: ‎他老是胡编乱造 他是个大骗子

translation.en: [Kevin] I'm telling Mom you called me a liar. I have to use the restroom.
translation.zh:
‎-我告诉妈你说我是骗子
‎-我要去一下洗手间

translation.en: -Don't look at the Gatorade. -[girls] Oh! [Lewis] You got this. You're a big boy!
translation.zh: ‎别看佳得乐 你没问题的 你是大孩子

translation.en: -Dog? -Neutralized.
Come on, Lewis.
You've had nothing to drink since noon. Yesterday.
translation.zh: ‎你从昨天中午到现在没喝过东西

translation.en: You got this, man!
[whispers] OK, here we go.
Hey, Clancy?
Like mother, like daughter.
Are you gonna kill me with carbs?
-Should have brought backup. -[woman] He did.
translation.zh:
‎-你应该带人来增援的
‎-他带了

translation.en: Hey. Is this about the tip?
Hello again, Mathilde.
Mathilde? No, that's Margot. Oh! OK. I understand.
translation.zh:
‎玛蒂尔德？不对 她叫玛戈特
‎噢 好的 我明白了

translation.en: So, apparently this is... [sighs] a huge misunderstanding.
I see you've met my friend Baxter.
translation.zh: ‎你见过我的朋友巴克斯特了

translation.en: Jean-Paul asked us to swing by, get the old band back together.
translation.zh: ‎尚保罗让我来一趟 把老队伍拉起来

translation.en: -No, thanks. [sighs] -Honey, you know these two?
translation.zh: ‎不用了 谢谢 ‎亲爱的 你认识他们俩？

translation.en: The crown of Durámuran, it's here.
Looks like you'll get one more shot at it after all.
I really think that you guys are in the wrong place.
You're talking about crowns. The Neidmeyers live two houses down.
translation.zh:
‎因为你们在说冠 对吧？
‎尼德迈尔家还要过去两幢房子

translation.en: He's a dentist, does lot of crown work, so--
translation.zh: ‎他是牙医 所以会做很多牙冠的活儿

translation.en: I'm not interested.
Oh, that's a shame. We need both of you.
translation.zh: ‎噢 太可惜了 你们俩我们都需要

translation.en: Both?
[together] Both.
-Are you guys talking about me too? -[both] No.
Oh, well, you said both, so that's--
translation.zh: ‎噢 你们说两人都需要 所以我…

translation.en: -Time's up. Are you in or dead? -OK!
translation.zh: ‎时间到 你要加入还是要死？

translation.en: No! No. That is not the saying. It's not "in or dead," it's "in or out."
translation.zh:
‎不对！不对 ‎话不是这么说的 ‎不是“要加入还是要死”
‎而是“加入还是不加入”

translation.en: It's "in or out."
translation.zh:
‎不是“要加入还是要死”
‎而是“加入还是不加入”

translation.en: I would like to speak for my wife, and we're gonna respectfully say
translation.zh: ‎我想代表我妻子说 ‎我们很尊敬地回答

translation.en: w-w-we are out.
-[panting] -I'm in.
-[sighs] -[Ron] W-What? Honey…
-Honey, wh-- -Good night.
-[Ron] Margot! -[gasps] -Relax! It's just a mild sedative. -[Ron] Margot.
translation.zh:
‎-玛戈特！
‎-噢 别紧张！只是中度镇静剂

translation.en: Your wife is a dangerous woman, Mr. Finch.
translation.zh:
‎你妻子是一个非常危险的女人
‎芬奇先生

translation.en: At least, she used to be.
[woman] Stuff 'em in the car. Let's get going.
translation.zh:
‎-玛戈特！
‎-把他们塞上车 然后出发

translation.en: Guys! Guys! Guys! Guys! Guys! Guys!
Hey, you're gonna wake up my parents!
No, they're gone! Ninjas just stole your parents.
translation.zh:
‎不是 他们不在了！
‎忍者把你父母偷走了！

translation.en: S-See? I never lie. I was telling the truth!
translation.zh: ‎看见没？我从来不说谎 我是说真的

translation.en: -[panting] -Oh, my God.
-[shouts] Mom? -[Mim] Why would they take your parents?
translation.zh: ‎神啊 妈？ ‎为什么会有人抓走你父母呢？

translation.en: No offense, your dad owns a bakery, your mom's a housewife.
translation.zh: ‎恕我直言 你爸是开面包房的 ‎你妈是家庭主妇 没什么

translation.en: -It's not thrilling. -I don't think your mom's really your mom.
translation.zh: ‎你妈是家庭主妇 没什么 ‎我想你妈可能不是真的你妈

translation.en: I think she was, like, the head ninja, and she was a very dangerous woman,
translation.zh: ‎她可能是忍者头头 是非常危险的人

translation.en: and they kept calling her... Mathilde.
What?
Mom has another name than "Mom"?
translation.zh:
‎妈妈除了叫妈妈之外
‎还有别的名字？

translation.en: No! Mom doesn't have another name, OK? She's not a ninja.
translation.zh:
‎没有 妈妈没有别的名字 好吧？
‎她不是忍者

translation.en: She won't go in the basement, she's afraid of crickets.
translation.zh: ‎她连地下室都不愿意去 ‎因为害怕蟋蟀跳来跳去

translation.en: -They're back! -Oh my God.
-Who's they? What? -[Mim mumbles] Shh!
[man] Oh my gosh.
Hello?
Anybody here?
Ooh, hey!
Kevin! I'm not here to hurt you, buddy.
translation.zh: ‎噢 哎 凯文！ ‎我不是来伤害你的 小伙子

translation.en: I'm-I'm a friend of your mom's. Remember me? Henry?
translation.zh: ‎我是你妈的朋友 记得吗？亨利

translation.en: OK. That is… a really cool sword.
Yeah. It's a pirate sword.
-Don't make me use it! -[Henry] Oh, OK. [laughs] Whoa.
Kevin, you are really brave,
but, I mean, we both know that's not a real sword, right?
translation.zh: ‎但是咱们都知道这不是真剑 对吧？

translation.en: He looks way too fat to be a ninja.
translation.zh: ‎他太胖了 不可能是忍者

translation.en: You know, I can hear you.
These things keep your ears warm, but don't keep the sound out.
translation.zh: ‎这东西是给耳朵保暖的 不是隔音的

translation.en: -Where are our parents? -[Henry] OK, listen.
translation.zh: ‎我们的爸妈在哪里？ ‎好的 听我说

translation.en: Kids, this is gonna sound confusing
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 这可能听起来不容易理解

translation.en: and a little scary.
My name is Henry Gibbs and I'm a U.S. Marshal.
translation.zh: ‎我叫亨利·吉布斯 我是联邦法警

translation.en: I work for the division of WITSEC. You might know that as Witness Protection.
About 15 years ago, your mom entered the program.
translation.zh:
‎大约15年前
‎你们的妈妈加入了证人保护计划

translation.en: [Kevin] Wait.
You mean to tell me our mom's in witness protection?
translation.zh:
‎你是说我们的妈妈
‎参加了证人保护计划？

translation.en: -Like what they do with mob guys? -I'm not allowed to get involved
translation.zh: ‎就像那些黑社会一样？ ‎我不准参与犯罪行动

translation.en: -with criminal activity. -Kids, look, a long time ago,
translation.zh:
‎我不准参与犯罪行动 ‎孩子们 听我说 ‎很久之前 你们妈妈
‎和一些很危险的人 渔妇帮

translation.en: your mom got into some bad things with some very dangerous people:
translation.zh:
‎很久之前 你们妈妈
‎和一些很危险的人 渔妇帮 ‎牵涉进了一些很糟糕的事

translation.en: the Pescatrici Syndicate.
They were going to jail,
and we convinced them to rat out a very big crime boss.
translation.zh: ‎我们说服他们供出了一个黑帮老大

translation.en: After that, we had to get them new identities.
translation.zh: ‎之后 我们给了他们新的身份

translation.en: It was my job to protect your mom.
Our mom had a whole different life? What's her real name?
translation.zh:
‎我们妈妈以前有完全不同的生活？
‎她的真名叫什么？

translation.en: Well, I mean, that's classified informa--
Mathilde Tremblay. Born November 7th, 1976, Ontario, Canada.
translation.zh:
‎玛蒂尔德·特伦布莱
‎1976年11月7日出生于加拿大安大略

translation.en: -[Clancy scoffs] -We're Canadian?
Wait, is that my phone? How did you get my passcode?
translation.zh:
‎等等 那是我的手机吗？
‎你怎么会有我的密码？

translation.en: What? The first four digits of your badge number?
-Yeah, that was tough to crack. -OK. Don't like her.
translation.zh: ‎对 这个密码真难破 ‎好的 我不喜欢她 好的 听我说

translation.en: Alright, listen.
translation.zh: ‎好的 我不喜欢她 好的 听我说

translation.en: A video of Kevin dancing, with his mom in it, got on the internet.
translation.zh:
‎一段凯文跳舞的视频
‎里面有他妈妈 视频上了网

translation.en: It went viral. It got, like, a million hits.
The bad guys must have seen it and tracked her down.
translation.zh:
‎坏人一定是看到了视频
‎然后找到了她

translation.en: A video of me...
Oh, no. Um, that... No, that didn't happen.
translation.zh: ‎噢 不是吧 没这种事

translation.en: -[Clancy] Nice job, Kevin. -Fiancé: Leo Beauchamp.
translation.zh: ‎厉害 凯文 ‎未婚夫 利奥·博尚

translation.en: Born May 11th, 1974.
translation.zh:
‎1974年5月11日出生
‎哇！看看这个帅哥

translation.en: -Whoa, check out this hottie. -What? She had a fiancé?
translation.zh:
‎1974年5月11日出生
‎哇！看看这个帅哥 ‎-什么？她有未婚夫？
‎-他好帅

translation.en: -[Kevin] He is pretty cute. -[Clancy] He's a musician?
translation.zh:
‎-什么？她有未婚夫？
‎-他好帅 ‎他是音乐人？

translation.en: -How long ago were they engaged? -This was so long ago.
translation.zh: ‎他们多久前订婚的？ ‎这是很久之前了！当时你们还没生！

translation.en: It's before you guys were even born.
translation.zh: ‎这是很久之前了！当时你们还没生！

translation.en: Kids, your mom is a completely different person than what she was.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 ‎你们妈妈当时是完全不同的一个人

translation.en: Tss! Yeah, no kidding. She was some Canadian named Mathilde!
translation.zh: ‎没错 ‎她当时是名叫玛蒂尔德的加拿大人

translation.en: What bad things did she do?
She stole things. Very expensive things.
translation.zh: ‎她偷了东西 很昂贵的东西

translation.en: I knew it! She always takes the free samples at the grocery store.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道！她老是拿超市的免费样品

translation.en: Not just one. I'm talking entire handfuls, OK?
translation.zh: ‎不是拿一个 是手上拿满 好吧？

translation.en: They said they were "getting the band back together." She said she was in.
translation.zh: ‎他们说要把队伍拉起来 她说加入

translation.en: [Henry] Uh, no, no. Hey, hey, stop it.
We're jumping to conclusions. Y-Your mom--
translation.zh: ‎不要妄下结论 你们妈妈…

translation.en: Mom? Whose mom? Is she even our real mom?
translation.zh: ‎妈妈？谁是妈妈？她是我们亲妈吗？

translation.en: Is anything real?
-My whole life has been a lie! -Oh, Kevin…
translation.zh:
‎-我的整个人生都是谎话！
‎-凯文

translation.en: Is that even my real name?
Of course it's your real name.
[Kevin] I hate hockey and Canadian bacon. It's just ham.
translation.zh:
‎我讨厌冰球和加拿大培根
‎就是火腿嘛

translation.en: I said some really, really mean stuff to her today.
translation.zh: ‎我今天对她说了很刻薄的话

translation.en: I called her pathetic.
-[Kevin] ...video off the internet? -[Henry] Yeah, it was adorable.
translation.zh:
‎-你说视频已经已经撤下网了？
‎-是的 很可爱

translation.en: Wait. This is Mom's necklace. She wears this every day.
translation.zh: ‎等等 这是妈妈的项链 她每天都戴

translation.en: -She never takes it off. -Yea, she never does.
Whoa, look at this.
Ooh, she left a message!
-[Clancy] What? -[Mim] Yes, what is this? Uh, Ang...
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-对 写了什么？ ‎呃 安…安格…

translation.en: -Am... Anger... -[Clancy] Ak... An...
Oh, Angus! Angus!
Who's Angus? Who's Angus?
-Your dog. Oh my God. -Yes. OK.
Hey, Angus.
Angus!
[shouts] What do you need to tell us?
-[dog breathing softly] -Hello? Anybody home?
Ah, it's no use.
-What's wrong with him? -I don't know. He's out cold.
translation.zh:
‎-他怎么了？
‎-不知道 它好冷

translation.en: Dude, he's drugged.
Take off his collar so he's more comfortable. Poor baby.
translation.zh:
‎把它的项圈拿下来
‎ 这样它会舒服一点 可怜的宝宝

translation.en: Wait.
One, nine, nine, Fayette Street.
That's not our address.
Wait a second.
Look! The symbols match. That has to mean something, right?
translation.zh: ‎看！符号一样 一定有含义 对吧？

translation.en: What would that mean? Who's at that address?
I don't know. Uh, maybe Mom's trying to tell us something?
translation.zh: ‎不知道 也许妈想要告诉我们什么？

translation.en: -We should go! -Children, listen.
translation.zh:
‎-咱们应该去！
‎-孩子们 听我说

translation.en: -Whatever you're trying to do right now-- -No!
translation.zh:
‎-不论你们现在想做什么…
‎-不行！

translation.en: Guys, whatever's at this address could help us find them.
translation.zh: ‎这个地方可能会帮助我们找到他们

translation.en: We can fix this.
-Let's go get Mom and Dad back. -[Henry] Uh, no way!
Those are dangerous people.
You need to leave this to the adults
translation.zh:
‎你们得交给成年人
‎和受过训练的专业人士

translation.en: and trained professionals such as myself.
translation.zh:
‎你们得交给成年人
‎和受过训练的专业人士 ‎比如我！

translation.en: Baby, you're tied to a chair with Christmas lights.
translation.zh: ‎宝宝 你被圣诞灯绑在椅子上

translation.en: Hey! You kids can't just leave me here. [sighs] Oh... Oh, see?
translation.zh: ‎哎！你们这帮孩子不能把我留在这里 ‎噢 是吧？

translation.en: You know what? I may have misjudged you.
-If you could just ke-- -[Christmas jingle playing]
Oh, she is the worst.
-[driver] Miriam? -Yeah, that's me.
It's night.
-Your parents know you're out? -Yes!
-Of course. -They joined a gang of ninjas.
translation.zh:
‎-知道
‎-当然知道 ‎他们加入了忍者帮

translation.en: -Shh! -Is this weird?
translation.zh: ‎有什么古怪吗？我会惹麻烦吗？

translation.en: -Will I get in trouble? -No, dude. Seriously?
translation.zh: ‎有什么古怪吗？我会惹麻烦吗？ ‎不会 不是吧？

translation.en: You're making it weird. You want me to give you the one star?
translation.zh: ‎你别弄得这么古怪 ‎要我给你评一星吗？

translation.en: -I'll do it. -She'll do it.
Lewis, come on, man.
This is our chance to be heroes in the real world.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们在真实世界做英雄的机会

translation.en: Not some imaginary world everyone says we live in.
translation.zh:
‎而不是像他们说的那样
‎活在想象的世界中

translation.en: Come on. Let's go save my parents.
OK.
-[Mim] Boys, let's go. -[Kevin] Get in the car.
Buckle up.
-[Baxter] Go. -[Ron] OK. Alright.
Witness protection. I can't believe you didn't tell me.
translation.zh: ‎证人保护计划 你居然没告诉我

translation.en: Honey, that's the point of witness protection.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 证人保护的重点就在此

translation.en: -You can't tell anyone. -So, what?
You were loosely associated with bad guys who were involved in criminal activity?
translation.zh:
‎你和参与犯罪行为的坏人
‎有松散的联系？

translation.en: Sure, we'll go with that.
So you're not really from Nebraska?
translation.zh: ‎所以你不是真的内布拉斯加人？

translation.en: -Yes. -Yes, you're from Nebraska.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-是的！ ‎你是内布拉斯加人
‎好吧 至少这是真的

translation.en: OK, well, at least that's true.
translation.zh:
‎你是内布拉斯加人
‎好吧 至少这是真的

translation.en: No. I mean, yes, I'm not from Nebraska.
translation.zh: ‎不是 我是说我不是内布拉斯加人

translation.en: What about your Cornhuskers T-shirt?
translation.zh: ‎那你的掰棒子T恤是怎么回事呢？

translation.en: They gave it to me.
-I'm sorry, I couldn't tell you. -[Ron] Is our marriage a lie?
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 我之前没办法告诉你
‎-咱们的婚姻都是谎言吗？

translation.en: No. I know this is traumatic.
translation.zh:
‎-不是 我知道这很难接受
‎-对 很难接受 咱们被用枪指着！

translation.en: Yeah! We're being held at gunpoint! We've been kidnapped!
translation.zh:
‎-不是 我知道这很难接受
‎-对 很难接受 咱们被用枪指着！ ‎-咱们被绑架了！
‎-闭嘴 否则我把你俩都杀了

translation.en: -Shut up before I kill you both. -Shutting up.
translation.zh:
‎-咱们被绑架了！
‎-闭嘴 否则我把你俩都杀了

translation.en: [Margot] Angus?
Angus! Hi, buddy.
Oh, you got old.
Who's there?
Mathilde.
-Leo. -Who's that?
-Her fiancé. -Her what?
Oh, that's great. That's… that's great.
-What are you doing here? -[softly] I don't...
I'm sorry.
For what?
[woman] For this!
What is happening?
[driver] This is it, kids.
[Clancy] Great. Creepy storage unit place.
translation.zh:
‎-很好 恐怖的仓库
‎-很可爱 很好

translation.en: -[Mim] It's cute. It's great. -[Clancy] This night keeps getting better.
translation.zh:
‎-很好 恐怖的仓库
‎-很可爱 很好 ‎今晚越来越精彩了

translation.en: [Lewis] I'm not allowed to break into private property.
-[Clancy] Your choice, Lewis. -[Mim] Nobody's allowed to trespass.
[sighs] Thanks, team. We got this. Thanks, guys.
translation.zh: ‎伙伴们 咱们可以的 谢谢

translation.en: Wait for me.
[Ron] OK, wait! I wanna make sure I get this straight.
translation.zh: ‎好的 等等 看看我有没有理解对

translation.en: You got the same exact kind of dog,
and then gave it the same exact name.
translation.zh:
‎取了一样的名字
‎知道我想给你的狗取什么名字吗？

translation.en: Know what I wanted to name it? Indiana Bones.
translation.zh:
‎取了一样的名字
‎知道我想给你的狗取什么名字吗？ ‎印第安纳骨头 但是你坚持…
‎现在大概知道为什么了

translation.en: But you insisted on Angus and now I know why.
translation.zh:
‎印第安纳骨头 但是你坚持…
‎现在大概知道为什么了

translation.en: I wasn't allowed to bring him into the program and I missed him.
translation.zh:
‎不允许我把他带进证人保护计划
‎但是我当时想他

translation.en: There's a midnight gala tonight in the Grand Concert Hall.
translation.zh: ‎今晚在大音乐厅有午夜狂欢

translation.en: The royal crown of Durámuran.
The crown will be on the head of the Queen of Moldana.
translation.zh: ‎这个王冠将由摩大拿王后戴上

translation.en: -The King and the Queen-- -Sorry, don't mean to interrupt, ma'am.
translation.zh:
‎-现在 国王和王后…
‎-不好意思 不是有意打断 女士

translation.en: Honey, is there a second set of children who look exactly like ours
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 是不是还有一群孩子 ‎和咱们的孩子一模一样的
‎要告诉我一下？

translation.en: that I should know about?
translation.zh:
‎和咱们的孩子一模一样的
‎要告诉我一下？

translation.en: [Leo] Wait. You have kids?
-Course you do. -Yeah.
I mean, when we both went into the program, I just…
translation.zh: ‎咱俩都加入了证人保护计划

translation.en: I guess I just never found… the right person.
translation.zh: ‎大概是我没找到合适的人吧

translation.en: You know what else you didn't find, Leo?
translation.zh: ‎知道你还有什么没找到吗 利奥？

translation.en: Your sleeves. You couldn't find your sleeves.
translation.zh: ‎你的袖子 ‎你找不到你的袖子 外面很冷

translation.en: -It's cold out! What's he trying to prove? -Ron!
translation.zh:
‎你找不到你的袖子 外面很冷 ‎-他想证明什么？
‎-罗恩！

translation.en: You know what? The answer is no. We won't do it.
-Then, we have no use for you. -[gun cocks]
-[Ron] Nah. -No, no. Wait, wait.
If we steal this,
that's it. We're done. We're even.
You leave my family alone.
We pull this off, we never have to work again.
translation.zh: ‎这件事做成 我们就不用再工作了

translation.en: We'll disappear. Those kids will be safe and sound.
translation.zh: ‎我们会消失 你的孩子会安然无恙

translation.en: No... it's too dangerous.
God, he's so big!
You heard what they said. If we commit another crime in the program,
translation.zh:
‎你听到他们的话了
‎如果我们在受保护期间再犯罪

translation.en: we go to jail for a long time.
There's no second chance for us this time.
translation.zh: ‎这次咱们没有第二次机会了

translation.en: Well then, we just won't get caught.
[Kevin] Oh, this is unit seven.
[sighs] But it's locked. Of course.
And we don't have the combination.
I mean... [sighs] I use my birthday for my locker.
translation.zh: ‎我的储物柜密码是我的生日

translation.en: Try my birthday.
My birthday is March 20th.
My birthday.
It's dark in there.
This is a bit of a letdown.
It's just Nana and Grampy's old crap.
There's nothing cool here.
[Mim] I don't know, babe. There's just a lot of chairs in here.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 这里有好多椅子啊

translation.en: [Clancy] We won't find anything.
translation.zh: ‎不可能在这里找到什么东西

translation.en: [Mim] There's at least four chairs in this corner.
translation.zh: ‎这个角落就有至少四张椅子

translation.en: I'm just really put off by the amount of chairs in front of us.
translation.zh: ‎有这么多椅子真是把我吓到了

translation.en: [automated voice] DNA recognized.
Kevin, what did you do?
Nothing! That was already there.
What?
-Kevin? -Kevin? -Kev? -[mechanism clanking]
Kevin?
Oh, yeah.
I don't think your mom was just a regular smash-and-grab thief.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你妈不只是普通的小偷

translation.en: -[softly] Yeah. -I saw this bad boy on Forza Horizon!
translation.zh:
‎对 ‎我在《极限竞速 地平线》里
‎见过这辆车

translation.en: -What? -[Kevin] Like the rarest car ever!
Can't believe Nana and Grampy have one of these!
Whoa!
Dude there's, like, a lot of handcuffs in here.
OK, OK. [gasps]
Your mom is getting cooler by, like, the second.
[Clancy] Is this hers?
Whoa! Look at this! Look, it's a lollipop knife!
Whoa!
[Clancy] What do we think?
-You need to take off that jacket. -[sighs]
-Because I'm falling in love with you. -[laughs]
What's this do?
-Let's not touch that! -[Lewis] Um, yeah.
-There's stuff in the pockets. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-等等 口袋里有东西
‎-什么？

translation.en: -[Mim gasps] -[Clancy] Oh, my God! Is that my mom?
-[Mim] Oh! -She won't even let me dye my hair.
What is...?
-Who's William? -[Clancy] I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎（威廉） ‎威廉是谁？ ‎不知道 不过他的电话少了最后一位

translation.en: It's missing the last digit of his phone number.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 不过他的电话少了最后一位

translation.en: There's an address. Maybe we can find him there.
translation.zh:
‎还有一个地址
‎也许我们能在这里找到他

translation.en: It's all the way in the city, though.
How are we gonna get there? None of us have a license.
translation.zh: ‎咱们怎么去市里呢？咱们都没有驾照

translation.en: Honestly, even if we did, Cape traffic on Friday is a nightmare.
translation.zh:
‎说实话 即便有驾照
‎周五鳕鱼角的交通也很恐怖

translation.en: -That's, like, three hours. -But it's only 30 nautical miles.
translation.zh:
‎-要开三个小时
‎-但是才30海里罢了

translation.en: Junior Marine Biologist Camp.
translation.zh: ‎参加过少年海洋生物学度假营

translation.en: Thirty miles. We could do that, right? Oh, but we need a boat.
translation.zh:
‎30海里 我们可以的 对吧？
‎噢 不过我们需要一条船

translation.en: I know someone who has a boat.
-No. -Yeah.
-No. -Yes.
-Mim! -Clancy!
-Are you insane? -Are you insane?
We're doing this.
-Mim, you know I can't do this. -We have to! You have to do this!
translation.zh:
‎-小米 你知道我不能这样做
‎-必须这样办 你必须这样！

translation.en: -You're crazy! -[in Spanish] Shut up!
[in English] It's to save your parents.
And maybe to get a boyfriend.
I'm not doing this.
Boys, you comin'?
Yeah, we're just gettin' some gear.
OK, how about this?
-[Lewis] It's just a pen. -Ah, you're right. I'll go put it back.
translation.zh: ‎就一支笔嘛 ‎哦 你说得对 我放回去

translation.en: A pen that shoots lasers!
Score!
Put that thing down, OK? Quit touching stuff! Let's go!
translation.zh:
‎把那东西放下来 好吗？
‎别乱碰东西了！走吧！

translation.en: [Lewis] We might need this.
How you gonna get us to Boston? You have your permit, not your license.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么把我们送去波士顿呢？ ‎你只有实习驾照 没有正式驾照

translation.en: You've driven dad's van twice, and almost killed us twice.
translation.zh:
‎你开了爸的面包车两次
‎差点把大家害死两次

translation.en: OK, I did not almost kill us…
the second time.
It's fine! I got this. I'm a great driver.
translation.zh: ‎没事 我能行 我开车技术很好！

translation.en: Also, that wig is awful. Please take it off.
translation.zh: ‎还有 这假发太难看了 请摘下来

translation.en: Oh, you're right. I don't look good as a redhead.
translation.zh: ‎噢 你说得对 我红发不好看

translation.en: -Hey! -Oh, what's this button do? -[girls] No-- -[engine roars]
translation.zh:
‎-哎 这个按钮是干嘛的？
‎-不要 等等…

translation.en: -[Clancy] What? -[automated voice] Predator mode engaged.
State your destination.
-[Mim] What are you doing? -[Clancy] Kevin! Oh my God!
Are you guys kid--
Slow down!
I'm not doing anything! It's, like, driving by itself!
I'm not allowed to drive in Predator mode!
I'm too handsome to die!
We're good, we're good. [sighs] OK.
-[distant party music] -[Mim] Oh my God!
-No, Kevin, why are you getting out? -We're coming!
translation.zh:
‎-别下车 凯文 你下车干嘛？
‎-我们也来！

translation.en: -[screams] -[Clancy] You're not.
-Stay here! -It's dark outside. And don't push any more buttons. OK?
translation.zh: ‎留在这里 别乱按按钮了 好吗？

translation.en: -[Kevin] But it's dark! -We need to go.
Oh my God, there's so many people.
Mim. Whoa, Mim, what are you doing?
-We have to figure out what to say-- -We'll say, "Give us your boat."
translation.zh:
‎-我们得想一下怎么说…
‎-我们就说：“把你的船给我们”

translation.en: -You can't just go-- -Act natural.
translation.zh:
‎-不能直接这样…
‎-自然一点 没事的

translation.en: -No! I'll embarrass myself. -Have fun! It's fine.
translation.zh:
‎-下水 好好玩 酷一点
‎-太丢脸了

translation.en: [Mim] Travis.
Hey. You came.
Hey. Cool party. [laughs]
Thanks.
OK, we need to get to Boston.
-What? -[Emma] Well, well, well. If it isn't Clancy Finch.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-哇哇哇 克兰西·芬奇来了

translation.en: Didn't think you had it in you to show up to a seniors' party.
I just thought, once a band nerd, always a band nerd.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为
‎“一日乐队呆子 终身乐队呆子”呢

translation.en: -Hey, Mim, nice outfit. -Really? Yours is terrible.
translation.zh:
‎-你好 小米 衣服不错
‎-真的？你的太难看了

translation.en: -Mm... Thanks. -[Kevin] Hey! What's up?
[girl] Hey, little man, what's up?
My God. Did you bring your little brother to the party?
translation.zh: ‎等等 天哪！你把弟弟带来派对？

translation.en: -[Kevin] Call me. -[Emma] So weird. How'd you get here? Your mom drop you off?
translation.zh:
‎太古怪了 你们怎么来的？
‎妈妈送来的？

translation.en: No, she got kidnapped by ninjas.
translation.zh: ‎不是 妈妈被忍者绑架了

translation.en: And she drove us here in a super cool car.
translation.zh: ‎她开一辆超酷的车带我们来的

translation.en: [chuckles] Wait. Aren't you the dancing dork from the bathroom?
translation.zh: ‎等等 ‎你就是那个在洗手间跳舞的傻瓜吧？

translation.en: [giggles] Yeah, he's so weird.
Alright.
OK. Hi. Hello. Yeah, we need to get across the bay to the city. It's urgent.
translation.zh: ‎好的 你好 我们需要穿过海湾去市里 ‎很急

translation.en: You can't just drive across the bay at night.
Yuh-huh. Me and my brothers go across all the time to go night fishing.
translation.zh: ‎可以的 ‎我和兄弟们经常半夜穿过海湾去海钓

translation.en: -It's totally cool. -Yeah, we could take you. Right, Joey?
translation.zh:
‎-完全没问题
‎-对 可以带上你们 好吗 乔伊？

translation.en: Whatever then. Have fun with band nerd and the freak fest.
translation.zh: ‎那随便吧 ‎和乐队呆子还有节日怪人好好玩吧

translation.en: Love you, too.
-We're gonna prep the boat now. -[Clancy] OK.
You go "prep the boat."
Uh, do you guys have proper flotation safety devices?
-[Travis] Definitely not. -[Joey] No.
Alright, here's what's gonna happen. Baxter will run intel. I'm interference.
translation.zh: ‎好的 这样 ‎巴克斯特做情报工作 我掩护

translation.en: You two, Count and Countess Van Der Holt of Belgium…
translation.zh: ‎你们俩 比利时的范德霍特伯爵夫妇

translation.en: secure the crown.
Escape routes are here on the east side through the ladies' room vents.
translation.zh:
‎逃跑路线在东边这里
‎通过女厕的通风管道离开

translation.en: Get the Queen there and the crown's an easy grab.
translation.zh:
‎在洗手间拿下王后
‎王冠就是囊中之物

translation.en: You got rid of your tattoo?
A tattoo? You said that was a birthmark.
You both had the same tattoo?
-Um... -[woman] Get ready.
Wheels up in ten.
-Honey, you said that was a birthmark. -I didn't know what to tell you.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你之前说是胎记 ‎亲爱的 当时不知该怎么说 对不起

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -The...
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 当时不知该怎么说 对不起

translation.en: -You thinking the Vermeer in Dubai? -[Margot] Exactly.
translation.zh:
‎-就像迪拜偷弗美尔画那样来？
‎-没错

translation.en: Make the Queen sick, corner her in the bathroom.
translation.zh: ‎让王后中毒 然后在洗手间拿下她

translation.en: [Ron] Dubai?
You... you went to Dubai?
OK, that's it!
I wanna know what the both of you are involved in, right now!
translation.zh: ‎我要知道你俩做过什么 现在说！

translation.en: -Rob… -Ron.
OK.
Look, we were just a couple of dumb broke kids
translation.zh: ‎我们当时只是一对傻傻的穷孩子

translation.en: looking for a bigger life and... I just wanted it the easy way.
translation.zh: ‎在寻找更好的生活 ‎我当时想抄近路

translation.en: I got us involved with Jean-Paul Deauxville.
translation.zh:
‎因为我
‎我们和尚保罗·多维尔扯上了关系

translation.en: Jean-Paul... [garbling]. -Jean-Paul Deauxville. -Jean-Paul... [garbling]. -Deauxville. -Jean-Paul... [garbling].
-OK. -I'm saying what you're saying.
Yeah, close enough.
He's a very dangerous, very connected man. Big-time smuggler and trafficker.
translation.zh: ‎他是非常危险、非常有人脉的人 ‎走私大佬

translation.en: You guys are smugglers?
Of... drugs?
[Margot] No, honey, don't worry. Nothing like that.
translation.zh: ‎不是 亲爱的 别担心 不是这种的

translation.en: I was a thief of expensive things.
translation.zh: ‎我以前是贼 偷值钱的东西

translation.en: Very expensive things.
Priceless artifacts we'd sell on the black market.
translation.zh:
‎价值连城的艺术品
‎我们会拿去黑市卖

translation.en: Mathilde… was the best of the best.
[Margot chuckles] OK, that's not-- I was not the best.
You stole the Sultan of Brunei's favorite polo pony during the polo match.
translation.zh:
‎你在马球比赛中
‎偷走了文莱苏丹最喜爱的马球马

translation.en: [Margot chuckles] OK. Well, yeah, that… that was good.
What a fun walk down memory lane,
when you both were big fat lying smugglers.
-Y-y-you're right, Ross. -My name is Ron!
translation.zh:
‎-你说得对 罗斯
‎-我叫罗恩！

translation.en: The point is, it was dangerous and illegal.
translation.zh: ‎重点是 当时很危险 而且是违法的

translation.en: -It was all my fault. -Ron.
-[Margot] We were wrong. -[Leo] You opened my eyes.
translation.zh:
‎-我们俩都不对
‎-但是你打开了我的眼界

translation.en: She convinced me that we had to get out. Witness Protection was the only option.
translation.zh: ‎是她说服了我得金盆洗手 ‎证人保护计划是唯一的选择

translation.en: [Margot] Our testimonies put Jean-Paul behind bars, where he belongs.
translation.zh: ‎我们的证言使尚保罗坐了牢 他活该

translation.en: We did the right thing.
Wow.
But it cost me everything.
I'm coming with you.
-What? -I'm going with you.
-I'm not gonna leave you-- -No! Absolutely not. It's too dangerous.
translation.zh:
‎-我不会抛下你…
‎-不行！绝对不行 太危险了

translation.en: -No, he could be useful. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎不 可能用得着他 ‎-谢谢
‎-声东击西

translation.en: -As a diversion. -Oh!
Especially if another situation like Romania happens.
translation.zh:
‎尤其是如果出现意外
‎就像罗马尼亚那次一样

translation.en: -Romania? When did you go to Romania? -Honey, no--
translation.zh:
‎-罗马尼亚？时候去了罗马尼亚？
‎-亲爱的 不是

translation.en: Listen. Hear that?
It's a helo. We're taking a helo. You don't have Dramamine.
translation.zh:
‎是直升机 我们坐直升机去
‎你没带晕车药

translation.en: -What about your motion sickness? -I don't get motion sickness. This is...
translation.zh:
‎-你晕机怎么办？
‎-我不会晕机 这真是…

translation.en: [Margot] Yes, you do.
Remember, in the cabin, throwing up for four days on the cruise?
translation.zh: ‎你晕机的 上次坐游轮 ‎你在船舱里吐了四天 忘了吗？

translation.en: For the last time, that was the King Neptune's potato salad.
translation.zh: ‎上次是因为海神王的土豆沙拉

translation.en: You don't make a mayonnaise-based side dish,
translation.zh:
‎蛋黄酱做的小菜
‎放上六个小时再给别人吃

translation.en: leave it out for six hours and expect no repercussions.
translation.zh:
‎蛋黄酱做的小菜
‎放上六个小时再给别人吃 ‎一定会吃出问题

translation.en: Guys, I'm really at home on the open water! Loving this.
translation.zh: ‎我太适应海上的环境了！爱了！

translation.en: -Is he OK? -He gets seasick like his dad.
translation.zh: ‎他没事吧？ ‎他和他爸一样晕船

translation.en: [man] U.S. Coast Guard.
translation.zh: ‎我们是美国海岸警卫队 关闭引擎

translation.en: Cut your engine and prepare for immediate boarding of your vessel.
translation.zh: ‎我们是美国海岸警卫队 关闭引擎 ‎准备我方立刻登船

translation.en: -Repeat, U.S. Coast Guard. Cut your... -[siren blaring] [Clancy] Uh, Travis, what's happening?
translation.zh:
‎-重复 我们是美国海岸警卫队 关闭…
‎-特拉维斯 怎么了？

translation.en: I don't exactly have my license, so, uh… we might get arrested now.
translation.zh: ‎我其实没有驾照 ‎所以我们可能会被捕

translation.en: -What? -What do you mean we might get arrested?
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-什么叫我们可能会被捕？

translation.en: We can't get arrested! We have to find my mom!
translation.zh: ‎我们不能被捕！我们得去找我妈！

translation.en: We can stall them, say we were messing around, got lost.
translation.zh: ‎我和乔伊拖住他们 ‎说我们在瞎转悠 迷路了

translation.en: You guys can swim.
-I mean… -No way!
I-I we don't have a choice, guys!
It's dark so they won't see you, but you gotta hurry.
translation.zh: ‎很黑 他们看不见你们 但是得快点

translation.en: OK. Are there things in there that can, like, eat us?
translation.zh:
‎-水里有没有东西会把我们吃掉？
‎-没有！

translation.en: -No. -Come on, you guys gotta go.
Clancy, what are you doing?
-[Clancy] We have to do this, guys. -No! Don't!
Wow.
-Guys, come on. -[Lewis screams]
-[Clancy] Hurry! Jump! -I don't think I can, Kev.
We can do this, together.
-[Clancy] Hurry! Jump! -It'll be fine.
-[man] This is the U.S. Coast Guard. -Come on, guys. Hurry up!
translation.zh:
‎-我们是美国海岸警卫队
‎-快跳！

translation.en: -[siren blaring] -[Kevin] You got this, Mim.
One. Two…
-Three! -[Mim screams]
♪ We won't leave until we get some So bring them right here ♪
translation.zh: ‎不拿到我们不会走 那就拿来吧…

translation.en: I never understood that.
translation.zh: ‎哎 从来都搞不懂 他们来 唱赞歌

translation.en: They come, sing carols, demand cookies, they don't leave until they get 'em.
translation.zh: ‎哎 从来都搞不懂 他们来 唱赞歌  ‎要饼干 不拿到 就不走

translation.en: Where's the Christmas spirit in that? It's just plain extortion.
translation.zh: ‎这里面有什么圣诞精神？就是敲诈嘛

translation.en: -Do you know what I mean? -[growls]
OK, calm down. We are gonna be friends. Right? We're fr... Oh, look.
translation.zh: ‎好的 冷静 咱们做朋友 好吗？看看

translation.en: Ha! Cupcakes, huh?
You want cupcakes? Let's get some cupcakes.
translation.zh: ‎你想吃杯蛋糕吗？咱们吃点杯蛋糕

translation.en: Get that... [grunts]
There will be a receiving line for the King and Queen in the grand ballroom.
translation.zh: ‎大宴会厅里 会列队欢迎国王和王后

translation.en: Leo, you install the poison strip on Mathilde's right palm.
translation.zh: ‎利奥 把毒药带贴到玛蒂尔德右手掌

translation.en: Mathilde, once you shake the Queen's hand and transfer the poison to her,
translation.zh:
‎玛蒂尔德 你和王后握手
‎毒药会粘到她手上

translation.en: the oils will absorb into her skin.
You'll have approximately three minutes before she gets sick.
translation.zh: ‎毒药会在大约三分钟后发作

translation.en: She won't die, but she'll feel pretty awful for a while.
translation.zh: ‎她不会死 但是会有一阵子非常难受

translation.en: Make sure nothing and no one besides the Queen touches that right hand.
translation.zh: ‎除了王后 不能让别人碰你的右手

translation.en: Honey, are you sure you're alright?
That helicopter ride really did a number on you.
translation.zh: ‎坐直升机确实把你伤得不轻

translation.en: Oh, no, I'm fine.
-Are you sure you're OK? -No, I'm-I'm totally fine. I'm...
translation.zh:
‎-真的没事？
‎-对 我完全没事 完全…

translation.en: -Are you gonna... -[swallows]
[burps] Yeah, I swallowed it.
I just need bread to settle my stomach. They're gonna have food at this thing?
translation.zh: ‎我要吃点面包垫垫胃 ‎那里会有东西吃 对吧？

translation.en: Uh, we're not really going to have time to eat tonight, Roy.
translation.zh: ‎咱们今晚没时间吃东西 莱恩

translation.en: Yeah, Ron!
It's Ron, Leo.
And I'm not talking about a sit-down dinner, Leo, OK?
translation.zh: ‎我不是说要坐下来吃大餐 利奥

translation.en: I'm talking about appetizers, or like, a little dip.
translation.zh: ‎我是说前菜 随便吃一点

translation.en: You know, I just think it's real interesting
that you happen to find a sleek-fitting tuxedo in that bag of yours,
translation.zh:
‎你居然刚好能在你包里
‎找到一套合身的燕尾服

translation.en: but here I am, looking like… like a hobo's butler.
Oh, and it's hot like a Berber carpet.
translation.zh: ‎而且热得像柏柏尔人的地毯

translation.en: [Leo] You know what?
Next time the three of us plan a heist together,
I'll make sure we pack more options for you, Raj.
translation.zh: ‎我一定给你多带几件衣服选 罗杰

translation.en: At this point, I know you know that it's Ron.
translation.zh: ‎现在我知道了 你知道我叫罗恩

translation.en: Baxter has eyes on you. Don't get cute.
translation.zh: ‎巴克斯特在看着你们 别刷小聪明

translation.en: [Ron] Excuse me.
-[Clancy grunting] -[Mim] Why are we doing this?
-[Clancy] That wasn't so bad. -[Mim] That was bad.
-[all panting] -[Mim] That was really bad.
Hey! You're a really good swimmer, Kev.
Thanks. I played Jaws in Jaws.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 我在《大白鲨》里演过大白鲨

translation.en: Kevin, shut up. No, you didn't. You're so weird.
translation.zh: ‎凯文 闭嘴吧 别胡扯 你太古怪了

translation.en: OK, seriously, he just, like,
swam that whole way with me on his back.
translation.zh: ‎差不多是他背着我游过来的

translation.en: So, maybe, let's not be mean right now.
translation.zh: ‎所以 咱们现在别刻薄他了

translation.en: My entire life flashed before my eyes back there.
translation.zh: ‎刚才我的一生都在我眼前闪现

translation.en: -[panting] Kev? -[whispers] Yeah?
It was really short... and really boring.
-[sighs] -Lewis... What is it?
I just felt boob on my back.
I think that's first base.
Totally worth it, dude.
-[Clancy] Is your underwear beeping? -No. Is yours?
translation.zh:
‎-是你的内衣在叫吗？
‎-不是 是你的吗？

translation.en: No.
It was from bay water. They've clearly malfunctioned.
translation.zh: ‎是因为海水 明显是故障了

translation.en: Oh my God, bay water! Ew! Why are we sitting here talking? My God! Ew!
translation.zh:
‎天哪！海水 恶心！
‎咱们坐这里聊什么啊？天哪！

translation.en: No, no, I can't. I literally cannot. We have to change right now.
translation.zh: ‎不行 真的不行 咱们现在得换衣服

translation.en: -There's a gift shop. Let's go in there. -Ooh, OK!
translation.zh: ‎那边有一家礼品店 咱们进去 ‎好的

translation.en: Hey, dude, we should check that out.
Passports.
Welcome, Count and Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎光临 范德霍特伯爵夫妇

translation.en: And…
[in French accent] This is our personal secretary,
Suzanne. -Su... [sighs]
Suzanne.
Hello! Haw, haw, haw.
[in bad French accent] Yeah, Suzanne is my family name,
but, eh, my friends, they call me… Frankie Fromage,
translation.zh: ‎但是我的朋友们叫我奶酪弗兰基

translation.en: because cheese is so strong, and I am strong, like cheese.
translation.zh: ‎因为奶酪很强 我像奶酪一样强

translation.en: I am a little bit more than a "secretary," yes?
[in English] Yes, I am their bodyguard because I can punch, and my hands
translation.zh:
‎对 我是他们的保镖 ‎因为我会打拳
‎我的手是致命武器 小心了

translation.en: are lethal weapons, you know, so watch out for me.
translation.zh:
‎因为我会打拳
‎我的手是致命武器 小心了

translation.en: I will... [yelps]
-Oh! -[man] Whoa! -Step back. -[Ron mutters]
He will pay for this. He is a count. He is very wealthy.
translation.zh: ‎他会赔 他是伯爵 非常有钱

translation.en: So put it on his tab. Where are you taking me?
translation.zh: ‎挂在他的账上 ‎你们带我去哪里？

translation.en: It's just a precaution. He's not on the list.
translation.zh: ‎以防万一 他不在名单上

translation.en: Once my men are done searching him, he'll join you both inside.
translation.zh:
‎我的人搜完之后
‎他会在里面和你们汇合

translation.en: Be as thorough as you need.
-Where'd they go? -I don't know. [sighs]
What are you wearing?
We brought you guys cloaks.
-[chuckles] -We are not wearing those.
-OK, it's cold. I'll make it work. -[man] Whoa, whoa, hey!
translation.zh: ‎好吧 很冷 穿了再说 ‎哎哎哎！

translation.en: Where'd you kids get those costumes, huh? You stay right there! I'm comin' down!
translation.zh: ‎你们这帮孩子哪儿拿的道具服装？ ‎别动 我下来了

translation.en: Shoot! Come on! And take off the wigs. You look ridiculous.
translation.zh: ‎糟糕！快走！假发摘掉 太可笑了

translation.en: But the hats make us look older?
translation.zh: ‎但帽子会让我们看起来大一点吗？

translation.en: Totally.
What? It's just a dry cleaner's. Where's Carp and Clam?
translation.zh:
‎什么啊？这是洗衣店
‎鲤鱼与蛤蜊餐厅在哪里？

translation.en: Oh, excuse me. Do you know where Carp and Clam is?
translation.zh:
‎噢 不好意思
‎知道鲤鱼与蛤蜊餐厅在哪里吗？

translation.en: -[man] The bar? -Yeah.
Uh, this used to be it. They had a fire. Closed down maybe six years ago.
translation.zh:
‎以前是在这里的
‎发生了火灾 大概六年前关了

translation.en: [Mim] OK. Thank you.
-What are we supposed to do now? -I don't know.
Guys, look. What's that thing Mom's always saying?
"Stop wiping boogers everywhere?"
Ew, no. The other thing. About the library?
translation.zh: ‎恶心 不是 另一句 关于图书馆的

translation.en: Oh! She's always talking about
translation.zh: ‎噢！她总是说自己经常去图书馆

translation.en: how she always went to the library, 'cause she had no friends.
translation.zh: ‎噢！她总是说自己经常去图书馆 ‎因为她没有朋友

translation.en: She's just trying to trick me into reading. I'm not falling for it.
translation.zh: ‎她是为了骗我看书 我才不上当

translation.en: William is the dead poet guy she's always quoting.
translation.zh: ‎威廉是她总是引用的已故诗人

translation.en: Guys, this is Mom's library, and this number,
translation.zh: ‎这是妈妈的图书馆 ‎这个数字

translation.en: it's not a phone number, it's a Dewey decimal system.
translation.zh:
‎不是手机号
‎是杜威十进制图书分类法

translation.en: It's a call number for a library book. Come on!
It's locked.
How are we gonna get in?
That's convenient.
OK, um, think...
I don't know who Dewey is, but his system sucks.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道杜威是谁
‎不过他的分类法太烂了

translation.en: Got it. Top floor. OK.
Maybe there's some kind of message written inside the books.
Oh my God. So we have to read all of these?
-[Clancy sighs] -[Mim] No. No way.
This is where the book's supposed to be. It's gone!
Maybe that Henry guy was right. Maybe this is a job for the police.
translation.zh: ‎也许亨利说得对 ‎也许是应该让警察来查

translation.en: Wait.
That's William Butler Yeats. That's her favorite.
translation.zh:
‎这是威廉·巴特勒·叶芝
‎她最喜欢的诗人

translation.en: I mean, that can't be a coincidence.
Maybe we're not supposed to find a book, maybe we're supposed to find… this?
translation.zh:
‎也许不是要我们找书
‎而是要找这个？

translation.en: "Although you hide in the ebb and flow of the pale tide when the moon has set,
translation.zh: ‎月落时 虽然你躲在白浪中

translation.en: the people of coming days will know about the casting of my net."
translation.zh: ‎但未来的人会知道我曾抛出了网

translation.en: Dude, your mom is into some Da Vinci Code stuff.
translation.zh: ‎哎 你妈真喜欢达芬奇密码这些东西

translation.en: [sighs] What are we looking for?
Wait.
-What's that? -It's Mom's. I brought it.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 这是什么？
‎-是妈妈的 我带了来

translation.en: No. Nope. No, no. No.
Not doin' it. Not doin' the stairs of doom tonight. No.
translation.zh: ‎不进去 今晚不走下死亡楼梯

translation.en: Whatever's down there is gonna lead to my parents.
translation.zh: ‎下面的东西一定会带我们找到我父母

translation.en: Will it? Will it? Or is this the part where the four spunky kids
go headfirst into the scary, dark unknown.
translation.zh: ‎一往直前冲进恐怖而黑暗的未知世界

translation.en: And she's getting the stool.
Oh my God. Don't do this.
I don't think we should do this. I think this is a bad idea.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得咱们不该下去 我觉得不好

translation.en: Now the children are getting in.
I don't want this! I don't want this adventure!
translation.zh: ‎我不想下去 我不想去冒险！

translation.en: No, no, no. Oh my God, no.
[Kevin] Where's my night-light when I need it?
translation.zh: ‎我的电筒怎么需要的时候找不到了？

translation.en: -Give me it! -[Lewis growls]
Don't worry, we... we got this!
[Mim] Ugh, gross.
Ah! What is that? Satan? No! I hate that. I hate that.
translation.zh: ‎是什么啊？撒旦？ ‎别来！我讨厌这东西

translation.en: I hate this. I hate this tunnel. What is this? Where are we?
translation.zh:
‎我讨厌这个隧道 这是什么啊？
‎这是哪里？

translation.en: -We should not be down here right now. -[echoing rumble]
I mean, OK, look, I know,
translation.zh: ‎我知道 今天夜里很离谱

translation.en: this night's been insane, and we might not make it out of this tunnel alive--
translation.zh: ‎我知道 今天夜里很离谱 ‎咱们也许不能活着走出这个隧道

translation.en: -Dude! -But, I mean, you... you're Mim.
-Yes? -You're not afraid of anything.
I mean, you're the bravest person I know. [chuckles]
I can't do half of the stuff that you do.
translation.zh: ‎你做的事 我一半都做不到

translation.en: -Clancy, look where we are right now. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎克兰西 看看我们现在所在的地方

translation.en: We are walking through this dark, disgusting tunnel at your request,
translation.zh:
‎根据你的要求
‎我们走在这个黑暗而恶心的隧道中

translation.en: in the worst all-nighter ever,
and we're doing it wearing the worst outfits on the planet.
translation.zh: ‎而且咱们还穿着世界上最糟糕的服装

translation.en: What is this? I hate these shorts. They come to such an unnatural length.
translation.zh:
‎这是什么啊？我讨厌这种中裤 ‎长度特别不自然
‎到了大腿的一半就没了

translation.en: They stop mid-thigh.
translation.zh:
‎长度特别不自然
‎到了大腿的一半就没了

translation.en: -[laughs] -You want brave? Mid-thigh is brave.
translation.zh: ‎你要勇敢？穿这种中裤就是勇敢

translation.en: -Give me a hug. What are you doing? -[chuckles]
Aw, bring it in.
Just bring it out. Just you two. Do your thang.
translation.zh: ‎释放出来吧 你们俩继续

translation.en: Spiderweb!
Oh, man. That was a gookie one.
Hate to see the monster that made that thing.
translation.zh: ‎很不喜欢看到做这东西的怪物

translation.en: Also, what is that?
How was your cavity search?
-Fun. -Need to find a way to reach Henry.
translation.zh:
‎很好玩 ‎-得想办法联系亨利
‎-不行 风险太大

translation.en: No, it's too risky. We just do what they want.
translation.zh:
‎-得想办法联系亨利
‎-不行 风险太大 ‎咱们就按他们的要求办

translation.en: They'll disappear. Your family will be safe.
translation.zh: ‎他们会消失 你的家人就安全了

translation.en: Wait a second, who's Henry? Henry, your best friend from college?
translation.zh: ‎等等 亨利是谁？ ‎等等 亨利？你大学的闺蜜？

translation.en: Let me guess. You didn't go to college together?
translation.zh: ‎噢 我猜一下 你们不是大学同学？

translation.en: Honey, he's the U.S. Marshal assigned to my case.
translation.zh: ‎哎 亲爱的 他是办我案子的联邦法警

translation.en: He came over for Thanksgiving when Kevin was a baby.
translation.zh: ‎凯文小时候 他感恩节会过来

translation.en: I baked him cranberry cornbread, and he said he loved it.
translation.zh:
‎我给他做了蔓越莓玉米面包
‎他说很喜欢吃

translation.en: It was a prescheduled home visit. He did love the cornbread. We all did.
translation.zh:
‎是预先安排好的家访 ‎他是很喜欢吃玉米面包
‎我们都很稀罕

translation.en: Well, why wouldn't he love the cornbread?
Your Excellencies,
my wife, the Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.zh: ‎我妻子 范德霍特伯爵夫人

translation.en: Very beautiful.
Yes, I'm a very lucky man.
I have never forgotten that.
OK, that's it. That's it. That's it! Alright, we're going home.
translation.zh: ‎好了 可以了 好的 咱们回家

translation.en: It touched my mouth. What happens if it goes in my mouth?
translation.zh: ‎我碰了嘴巴 到我嘴巴里了 ‎到我嘴巴里怎么办？

translation.en: Remember when Kevin drank a glow stick and poison control said to give him milk.
translation.zh:
‎凯文以前吃了荧光棒里的东西
‎毒物控制署说要给他吃牛奶

translation.en: Can I get milk? I need some milk! Can I get some milk?
translation.zh: ‎能给我来点牛奶吗？我要喝牛奶！

translation.en: Please excuse our assistant, he has not been feeling well.
translation.zh:
‎请原谅我们的助理 ‎-他不太舒服
‎-食物中毒

translation.en: Food poisoning. [in French] Terrible.
translation.zh:
‎-他不太舒服
‎-食物中毒 ‎-很可怕
‎-脑子中毒了 没错

translation.en: -[Ron retching] -[in English] Poisoning of the brain.
translation.zh:
‎-很可怕
‎-脑子中毒了 没错

translation.en: -[Margot chuckles softly] -[sighs] You know, you know what?
[chuckles] I think I'm OK.
-I'm alright, I'm OK. -[they chuckle]
-You know what? I think… I overreacted. -[Leo laughing]
I've a strong immune system. I'm... I overreact a bit. Nice to meet...
translation.zh:
‎免疫系统很强大
‎我反应过度了 幸会…

translation.en: Oh God... I think I'm OK.
-[retches] -[security] Move back!
[Mim] It just looks like somebody's gross house.
What kind of freak would actually live down here?
translation.zh: ‎什么样的怪人会住在这下面？

translation.en: [woman] What kind of freaks would go snooping around when they didn't live here?
translation.zh:
‎什么样的怪人不住在这里
‎却会到处窥探？

translation.en: Good point.
-No! Kevin, no! -[woman] Start talking.
translation.zh: ‎凯文！别伤害他！ ‎说 你们怎么找到这里的？

translation.en: How did you find this place?
translation.zh: ‎说 你们怎么找到这里的？

translation.en: Our mom had a key! Her name's Margot Finch!
translation.zh: ‎我妈有一把钥匙 她叫玛戈特·芬奇

translation.en: Don't know her. Wrong answer.
-[Kevin yelps] -No. Mathilde Tremblay!
translation.zh: ‎不对 玛蒂尔德·特伦布莱

translation.en: He means Mathilde Tremblay. I think she sent us here.
translation.zh:
‎他是说玛蒂尔德·特伦布莱
‎应该是她让我们来这里的

translation.en: -How do you know Mathilde? -[Kevin] She's our mom!
translation.zh:
‎-你们怎么会认识玛蒂尔德？
‎-她是我们妈妈！

translation.en: I think she's our mom. Please don't hurt me.
translation.zh: ‎我想她是我们妈妈 请不要伤害我

translation.en: [woman] Oh, yeah. You have her eyes.
translation.zh: ‎对 你的眼睛和她一模一样

translation.en: So, you know her?
Yeah. We were like sisters.
Wow. Mom is not like I thought she was.
Oh. Right.
[sighs] I just got off a job.
Oh, where do you wo...
Oh, you... you stole that stuff.
Not like a big deal or anything. We steal stuff all the time, right?
translation.zh:
‎也不是什么大事
‎我们也经常偷东西 对吧？

translation.en: One time, I took two puddings at lunch. I'm a real bad boy.
translation.zh:
‎有一次我一次就拿了两个布丁
‎我是个很坏的孩子

translation.en: Kevin. Could you maybe just…
translation.zh: ‎凯文 ‎能不能说一下你所知的我妈的情况？

translation.en: tell us everything you know about my mom?
translation.zh: ‎能不能说一下你所知的我妈的情况？

translation.en: We grew up together. Pulling jobs. Just kids' stuff, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我们一起长大 做事 孩子那些事

translation.en: Scamming tourists, pickpocketing, petty theft, your basic B and E.
translation.zh: ‎骗游客 小偷小摸 进屋里偷

translation.en: Your idea of "kid stuff" is, like, a lot different than ours.
translation.zh:
‎你说的孩子的事
‎和我们想象中的区别很大

translation.en: Then we got mixed up in some bad stuff with this guy named Jean-Paul.
translation.zh: ‎后来有些不好的事 牵扯了尚保罗

translation.en: J-Jean-Paul! That's the guy Henry was talking about.
translation.zh: ‎尚保罗 亨利提过他的事

translation.en: He's in prison now, but his people, they came after my mom
translation.zh:
‎他现在在监狱
‎但是他的人来找我妈

translation.en: and now they're planning this huge job, and we're trying to find her.
translation.zh: ‎现在他们在计划做一件大案 ‎我们在想办法找到她

translation.en: What makes you think she wants to be found?
translation.zh: ‎你们为什么觉得她希望被找到？

translation.en: That necklace you're wearing.
translation.zh:
‎你的项链
‎她留了一条一模一样的给我们

translation.en: She left us the same one to get down here.
translation.zh:
‎你的项链
‎她留了一条一模一样的给我们 ‎追踪到这里

translation.en: She left us tons of clues, they all led here.
translation.zh:
‎她给我们留下了很多线索
‎引导我们到了这里

translation.en: I think she wanted us to find you so you could help us.
translation.zh: ‎我想她想要我们找到你 ‎让你来帮我们？

translation.en: [woman] Your mom gave me something before she went into witness protection.
translation.zh:
‎你妈妈在进入证人保护计划之前
‎给了我一样东西

translation.en: She said I would know if it ever came time to open it.
-[Clancy] What is that? -[Kevin] It's a pager.
My God, the olden days were tragic.
It's not a pager.
It's an old tracking device.
[Ron] OK, I'm much better now.
Ahh... OK. Yeah. That's all. No more is comin'... [groans]
translation.zh: ‎好的 就这样了 没有了

translation.en: Yeah, I think I'm done.
Oof! Stay away from the seafood dip.
If I'm giving advice, stay away from the seafood dip
because it's mayonnaise-based.
So, it's just not a good call.
So, just stay awa-- [groans]
Mm, OK. [laughs] I thought it was coming out of both ends.
But it didn't… [sighs] It didn't.
We're good. Everybody, we're good.
What happened to your accent?
What happened to my...
[in bad French accent] How dare you, sir?
What? Who? Sir!
How dare you... say something like that to me
-in front of the royal family? -Save it.
-Do what? -We put in a call to your consulate.
translation.zh:
‎-干嘛？
‎-我们给你们领事馆打了电话

translation.en: These... are fake.
There is no Count or Countess Van Der Holt.
translation.zh: ‎不存在范德霍特伯爵或者伯爵夫人

translation.en: Well, what time did you call?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你是什么时候打的电话？

translation.en: -Maybe it was lunch and they-- -Keep on them.
-I'm gonna go and get this sorted out. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-他们可能去附近逛了
‎-我去查清楚

translation.en: No, I'm saying, to get a croissant or…
translation.zh: ‎不是 我是说可能去拿羊角面包或者…

translation.en: Both ends.
Alright, she must have had a personal tracking device implanted on her in case something ever happened.
translation.zh: ‎她身上一定有追踪设备 以防万一

translation.en: The Grand Concert Hall downtown.
Duran Duran! They said something about the Crown of Duran Duran!
translation.zh:
‎杜兰杜兰！
‎他们提到了杜兰杜兰王冠！

translation.en: Durámuran? The Crown of Durámuran?
Oh, Lord... It's the Holy Grail.
They've been tracking that for years.
Your mom and I tried to steal it from the Louvre. [sighs]
translation.zh: ‎我和你妈曾经想从卢浮宫偷这个王冠

translation.en: That's a good bedtime story.
There's an event tonight at the Grand Concert Hall. A big gala.
translation.zh: ‎今天在大音乐厅有活动 大型狂欢

translation.en: You know what? If the crown is at that gala, so is your mom.
translation.zh: ‎如果王冠在那里 那你妈也在

translation.en: OK, great! Let's go!
Um... no. I'll handle it. OK? You guys stay here. It's not a kids' job.
translation.zh:
‎不 我来处理 好吗？
‎你们留在这里 这不是孩子做的事

translation.en: No. We have to go. We're not gonna get hurt, I promise.
translation.zh:
‎不行 我们得去
‎我们不会受伤 我保证

translation.en: Aw, that's so sweet. I don't care if you get hurt.
translation.zh: ‎说得太好了 我不关心你们是否受伤

translation.en: You'll slow me down, blow my cover.
translation.zh: ‎你们会拖我的后腿 害我被发现了

translation.en: Uh, we're not slowing anybody down. We can blend in, right?
translation.zh:
‎我们不会拖后腿
‎我们可以混进去 对吧？

translation.en: Is that so, General?
Actually, this insignia is for the rank of commander.
translation.zh: ‎这个徽章其实是指挥官用的

translation.en: But historically correct facts are not important right now.
translation.zh: ‎但是正确的史实现在不重要

translation.en: Non-negotiable, OK?
Your mom sent you here so I would keep you safe, not send you off to get killed.
translation.zh:
‎你们妈妈让你们来这里
‎是为了让我保护你们 ‎不是让你们去送死 好好待着吧

translation.en: Make yourselves comfortable. There are video games, peanut butter…
translation.zh: ‎不是让你们去送死 好好待着吧 ‎这里有电子游戏 花生酱

translation.en: -I'm allergic to peanuts. -Same.
[sighs] You're not coming.
OK, fine.
But, uh, just out of curiosity, what is your plan?
translation.zh:
‎不过 出于好奇问一下
‎你打算怎么办？

translation.en: I'll go into an air vent that'll lead me to the subway
and take me directly to the Grand Concert Hall downtown.
Anything else?
Yeah, which vent was that?
[grunts] The one right over...
Please don't find me and kill me. I just need to get my mom back.
translation.zh:
‎请不要来追杀我
‎我只是想把我妈救会来

translation.en: -Not bad. -[chuckles] Although I definitely will find you and kill you.
translation.zh: ‎不错啊 不过我一定会追杀你

translation.en: -You'll kill her, but we're cool, right? -Thanks, lady.
translation.zh: ‎你会杀她 但咱们之间没事 对吧？

translation.en: Oh! Come on!
-I'm not allowed on public transport-- -We know!
translation.zh:
‎没有女性监护人陪同
‎我不准坐公共交通 ‎知道的！

translation.en: Where now?
-Um... This way! Come on. -[Kevin] OK!
[Mim] We're never getting past that security.
translation.zh: ‎咱们不可能过得了这些警卫

translation.en: I don't know about you guys, but we might be able to get in.
translation.zh:
‎你们我就不知道了
‎不过我们可能进得去

translation.en: Have you seen yourself?
Oh, you're right. It's the cravat.
Hey, what about up there?
[Clancy] Window's open.
You'll never fit.
I'll do it.
Oh, doesn't your mom have a rule about breaking into buildings at night?
translation.zh:
‎半夜闯入大楼
‎你妈没对此立规矩吗？

translation.en: My mom is not here.
-He took off the cape. -OK.
-[Lewis] Hold my hat. -Snap!
[groans] Come on, Lewis.
Make it happen, Lewis. [grunts]
-You can give me a hand with this part. -[Mim] Right.
translation.zh:
‎-帮一下忙啊
‎-噢  好的 我们刚才在看

translation.en: -We were watching. -[Kevin] I had the hat.
translation.zh:
‎-帮一下忙啊
‎-噢  好的 我们刚才在看 ‎抱歉

translation.en: -[Clancy] Sorry. There you go. OK -[Mim] There it is.
[Kevin] You got this!
-[Lewis grunts] -[Kevin] Squeeze! Squeeze!
-Oh my God. -Oh my God. Look at that.
-He's really doin' it- -[Lewis yelps]
-[thud, clatter] -Uh-oh. It's OK. Walk it off.
translation.zh:
‎-哎呀！
‎-没事 ‎撑住 你很厉害

translation.en: -You're good. -[Clancy chuckles]
-Does he know where to go? -I hope so.
translation.zh:
‎-他知道该走哪边吗？
‎-希望他知道

translation.en: OK.
Hey! What are you guys doing back here?
Uh, we... We were just, um…
Oh my gosh, we've been wandering around this place forever.
translation.zh: ‎天哪！我们在这里转了半天了！

translation.en: So, uh, which way to the stage? Yeah, we just need to set up.
translation.zh: ‎舞台从哪边走？我们要布置一下

translation.en: Just got in from Denver. What a cluster that airport is. Am I right?
translation.zh:
‎刚从丹佛过来
‎那机场真繁忙 是吧？

translation.en: Never been there.
We're the kid musical ensemble booked for tonight.
translation.zh: ‎我们是今晚预订的儿童乐团

translation.en: Paul Revere's Midnight Ride?
Never heard of us? We're pretty big on YouTube.
translation.zh:
‎没听过我们？
‎我们在YouTube上很火的

translation.en: Mim, show him the video. The viral one.
translation.zh: ‎小米 给他看视频 火了的那个

translation.en: Two-point-three million hits and climbing.
Come on. You think we dress like this for kicks?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 我们没事会穿成这样吗？

translation.en: Alright, alright, come on.
[Kevin] Good evening. Tut-tut. We are Paul Revere's Midnight Ride.
translation.zh: ‎晚上好！ ‎我们是保罗·里维尔的午夜之旅乐团

translation.en: We have an amazing performance planned for everyone here.
translation.zh: ‎我们安排了精彩的演出给各位

translation.en: So, to kick the night off,
we have Cool Clancy on the cello.
-Let's strike up the band! -[tepid applause]
[whispers] Sit down.
[whispers] Kevin...
[whispers] No. [sighs] I can't... I'm not like you.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我不行 我不像你

translation.en: [sighs] I knew it. I knew it!
Uh... Security?
We got a mess down here on the stage. Kids in pilgrim shoes.
translation.zh: ‎舞台上有麻烦 有孩子穿着粗跟鞋

translation.en: -[oboe squeaks] -Clancy, we need you to go. Now.
I can't play in front of all these people.
translation.zh:
‎凯文 当着这么多人的面
‎我没办法演奏

translation.en: Of course, you can. You got this! Quickly!
translation.zh: ‎当然可以 你没问题的 快点！

translation.en: -[sighs] I'm not ready. -Yes, you are.
translation.zh: ‎我还没准备好 ‎你准备好了 你这么有天赋

translation.en: -You're so talented. -I need backup ASAP, please.
translation.zh:
‎你准备好了 你这么有天赋 ‎请求立即增援 快下来
‎这里有孩子穿着古装

translation.en: We got kids in puffy shirts. I need backup!
translation.zh:
‎请求立即增援 快下来
‎这里有孩子穿着古装 ‎请求增援！

translation.en: -Backup ASAP, please! Thank you. -Wait, wait.
Alright, we've got new orders to take 'em to the embassy.
translation.zh: ‎好的 有新的命令 带他们去大使馆

translation.en: FBI is involved. Apparently, there's some security risk.
translation.zh: ‎联邦调查局介入了 显然有安全风险

translation.en: Take care of it.
Oh, you two have a secret code now, a secret language.
translation.zh: ‎噢 你们俩现在有暗号了 密语

translation.en: Is that what's going on? That's... perfect.
-[Leo speaking French] -What does that mean, Leo?
-Duck! -[Ron] What?
-[guard 3 grunts] -What's happening?
Uh, cancel that. They're legit.
translation.zh: ‎呃 取消吧 他们没问题

translation.en: Let's go.
Where'd you learn that? Did you just kill that guy?
translation.zh:
‎哪儿学的啊？
‎是不是把那个人弄死了？

translation.en: No, I just crushed his windpipe a little.
translation.zh: ‎没有 只是把他的气管打碎了一点

translation.en: He'll be fine with immediate medical attention.
translation.zh: ‎立即进行医疗救治就不会有事

translation.en: "Crushed his wind pi--" Have you ever killed anyone?
translation.zh: ‎把他的气管打碎… ‎你杀过人吗？

translation.en: No! Our paramilitary training taught us how to neutralize a target
in under four seconds using mostly non-fatal tactics.
translation.zh:
‎教会我们使用最不致命的战术
‎在四秒内消灭目标

translation.en: "Paramilitary training"? "Non-fatal"?
You made me open up a jar of mustard for you last week. You faked it!
translation.zh: ‎你上周让我帮你开芥末瓶 你装的！

translation.en: -I faked it. -Oh my God. Is our whole life a lie?
translation.zh:
‎-我装的
‎-天哪！我们所有的生活是谎言吗？

translation.en: -What do we... What do we... What... -[Margot panting]
Who did I marry?
Is that Clancy?
Sounds like Clancy.
Clancy.
[Margot] Kids, stay there. I'm coming for you.
translation.zh:
‎-妈？
‎-孩子们 别动 我来了

translation.en: Mom!
Is this what Mom does when we're asleep?
translation.zh: ‎咱们睡着后妈妈就是干这个？

translation.en: Oh... knock it off!
-Dad does not look good. -Nuh-uh.
Oh my God, she looks amazing!
There's a guy there.
Make way! Move!
-Crown. Get the-- -[man screams]
Come on, jump!
-Clancy. -Hi.
We gotta get outta here.
-Come on! -[Ron] How did you guys get here?
-[overlapping voices] -[siren blaring] [Clancy] Is that gonna be my car? Can I learn to drive?
translation.zh:
‎我们找到了
‎芬奇太太留在桌子上的暗号

translation.en: [Mim] So great. Then we found a secret hideout. [Kevin] Then, Jay tracked you with your GPS chip.
translation.zh:
‎-我们找到了她的秘密藏身处
‎-然后 杰伊用你的定位芯片找到了你
