translation.en: [Margot] Kids, I'm sorry I got you involved in all this.
translation.zh:
‎孩子们 真的很抱歉
‎把你们牵涉了进来

translation.en: No, Mom. I'm sorry for what I said.
translation.zh: ‎不 妈妈 我对你说的那些话 很抱歉

translation.en: You're not pathetic, you're amazing, and I know you might miss your old life,
translation.zh:
‎你不可悲 你太棒了
‎我知道你可能想念以前的生活

translation.en: but we had to find you and try and get you back. Just please don't go.
translation.zh:
‎但是我们得找到你
‎想办法把你找回来 请不要走

translation.en: Honey, I would never leave you!
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 我永远不会离开你！

translation.en: Hey, old friend.
Looks like your grand plan worked. Here I am. And I…
translation.zh: ‎看来你的伟大计划成功了 我来了

translation.en: pulled a twofer.
Course you did.
-Yeah. -[Ron] Sorry, do we know her?
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-不好意思 咱们认识她吗？

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, she's a good guy. Well, kind of a bad guy.
translation.zh:
‎噢 对 放心 她是好人
‎呃 她有点算坏人

translation.en: She's a good bad guy.
-We should go. -Go.
I'm gonna keep 'em busy, erase all the footage…
translation.zh: ‎我会拖住他们 把监视录像都删掉

translation.en: Hey, you. No, no, no. Hand over the Rolex.
translation.zh: ‎哎 你别走 劳力士给我

translation.en: You have, like, a thousand.
Thank you, good bad guy.
Thank you. I knew you'd know what to do.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 我知道你会知道该怎么做

translation.en: Yeah. I was ready. I just never pictured it with… kids.
translation.zh:
‎对 我准备好了
‎只是没想到来的是孩子

translation.en: -Yeah. -Your kids. But… I kind of like it.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-你的孩子 不过我挺喜欢的

translation.en: Thank you.
You live here? In downtown?
It's actually more of a safe house that I keep for emergencies, but, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎更像是我紧急时候使用的安全屋

translation.en: [Kevin] That's so cool! Dad, isn't that cool?
Eh, is it cool? Or is it fiscally irresponsible?
translation.zh: ‎酷吗？还是在财务上不负责任？

translation.en: You know, because rent downtown is very expensive, son.
translation.zh: ‎市中心的租金很贵 孩子 所以…

translation.en: Hey, thanks for sittin' on the towel, bud.
translation.zh: ‎哎 谢谢你在毛巾上拉屎 兄弟

translation.en: I appreciate you not getting vomit on the Corinthian leather.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你没有吐在皮座椅上
‎你懂的 是吧？

translation.en: -You understand, right? -Yeah, I understand, Leo.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你没有吐在皮座椅上
‎你懂的 是吧？ ‎对 我懂 利奥

translation.en: Honey, how's your arm? What happened?
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的 你的手臂还好吧？怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. It was a blur.
translation.zh: ‎噢 不知道 有点模糊了

translation.en: Lot of fists were flying around. And I think I punched a couple of guys.
translation.zh:
‎很多拳头打来打去
‎我应该打了几个人

translation.en: Uh, I mean... I think that may have happened when you fell down, awkwardly.
translation.zh: ‎可能尴尬地摔倒时会出现这种情况

translation.en: -Probably only a bruise. -I think it's a bit more than a bruise.
translation.zh: ‎大概只是淤伤 ‎应该比淤伤要厉害一点 利奥

translation.en: -Uh, maybe like a funny bone. -Nah, I don't think it's a funny bone.
translation.zh: ‎可能是骨头麻了 ‎应该不是骨头麻了

translation.en: Uh, you know. -Uh-huh. -[Leo] OK, well, you know.
-I mean... -[Ron] Agree to disagree.
Actually, I'm gettin' a bit numb, so it's probably gonna affect my work.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 有点麻了 大概会影响工作

translation.en: Oh. Uh, you're a surgeon?
No, Leo. I am…
translation.zh:
‎不是 利奥 我是糕点主厨
‎我需要手指的力量和灵活

translation.en: a pastry chef, and I need my finger strength and dexterity, so there you go.
translation.zh:
‎不是 利奥 我是糕点主厨
‎我需要手指的力量和灵活 ‎这样啊

translation.en: Is that a real Capicchioni?
-[Margot] We're all safe. -You know that. [laughs] Yeah, it is.
-[Clancy] Can you play? -[Leo] Sure.
There he goes, exposing more flesh. Who is he doing that for?
translation.zh: ‎他又来了 露出更多肉 ‎他露给谁看啊？

translation.en: His arms are like Popeye's. It's unbelievable.
translation.zh: ‎他的手臂像大力水手一样 不可思议

translation.en: Alright.
I activated emergency protocol. We're all safe now.
translation.zh:
‎我激活了紧急情况流程 ‎咱们现在都安全了
‎只要等着亨利来联系我就行

translation.en: Just have to wait for Henry to contact me.
translation.zh:
‎咱们现在都安全了
‎只要等着亨利来联系我就行

translation.en: How much is this worth, anyway?
I'd say somewhere in the ballpark of 20 million.
[Kevin] Crazy! Twenty million?
We're giving it back. It doesn't belong to us.
translation.zh: ‎咱们要还回去 这不属于我们

translation.en: But, Mom, you used to steal stuff all the time when you were younger.
translation.zh: ‎但是 妈妈 你年轻时经常偷东西

translation.en: -It was pretty cool. -No.
Why can't we just say we lost it or something?
Kev, listen to me. I was wrong.
translation.zh: ‎凯文 听我说 ‎我以前的做法是错的

translation.en: I paid a hefty price for it. And now, it's put the people I love in danger.
translation.zh:
‎我为此付出了巨大的代价
‎现在 也使我爱的人有了危险

translation.en: OK? I don't ever want any of you guys doing anything I did.
translation.zh: ‎我不希望你们任何人走我的老路

translation.en: I made a lot of bad choices, and hurt a lot of people.
translation.zh:
‎我以前作了许多不好的选择
‎伤害了许多人

translation.en: And we really regret it. Don't we, Leo?
translation.zh: ‎我们真的很后悔 是吧 利奥？

translation.en: Well, eh…
Of course, we do. We had to go into witness protection to escape Jean-Paul.
translation.zh:
‎当然后悔
‎咱们不得不进入证人保护计划 ‎才能摆脱尚保罗

translation.en: Well, actually, you went into witness protection.
translation.zh: ‎其实是你进入了证人保护计划

translation.en: I just couldn't get on board with that.
translation.zh:
‎而我却做不到
‎而且尚保罗已经进了监狱

translation.en: With Jean-Paul away in prison, which I have you to thank for,
translation.zh:
‎而我却做不到
‎而且尚保罗已经进了监狱 ‎幸亏你

translation.en: there was an opening for a new Head of Operations.
-Mom, what's going on? Who is that? -[Leo] You remember Elise?
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈 怎么回事？这是谁？
‎-还记得爱丽丝吗？

translation.en: She's with me. I sent her to get you.
translation.zh: ‎她和我一起的 我派她去找你的

translation.en: Oh! OK, I knew it. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎噢 好的 我早就知道了

translation.en: I knew he was a bad guy. Well, how about this?
translation.zh: ‎我早就知道他是坏人 ‎这样吧？

translation.en: Huh?
How about that on your Corinthian leather?
That's not cool, Ron.
You're not cool.
After we found you this time,
translation.zh: ‎在这个小肉球和他的视频的帮助下

translation.en: with the help of that little meatball and his video--
translation.zh: ‎在这个小肉球和他的视频的帮助下 ‎我们找到了你

translation.en: Hey! Don't call my brother a meatball.
I knew the only way I was going to get you to help me steal the crown
translation.zh: ‎我知道能让你帮我偷王冠的唯一办法

translation.en: was if you thought our lives were in danger.
translation.zh: ‎是让你以为这与咱们性命攸关

translation.en: Your moral compass, always getting in the way of us having a good time.
translation.zh: ‎你的道德感 一直在妨碍咱们

translation.en: -So you never went into protection. -[Leo] No.
translation.zh: ‎你根本没有进入证人保护计划 ‎是的 拜托 承认吧

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[Leo] I mean, come on, admit it.
You must be bored out of your mind. Driving carpool, going to Costco.
translation.zh:
‎你一定觉得无聊透顶了
‎开共乘车道 去好事多

translation.en: You're happy with Strawberry Shortcake? No offense, Ron.
translation.zh: ‎告诉我 你和这草莓蛋糕一起很满意 ‎无意冒犯 罗恩

translation.en: -Offense taken, Leo. -You can't talk to our dad like that.
translation.zh:
‎-冒犯到我了 利奥
‎-你不能这样对我们爸爸说话

translation.en: The plan was simple in the beginning.
Get you to help steal the crown, frame you for it, then we disappear.
translation.zh:
‎让你帮忙偷王冠
‎嫁祸给你 然后我们消失

translation.en: But admit it…
you had fun.
Spark's still there. Come with me.
What's it gonna be, Mathilde?
You're right.
Spark is still there.
And the name is Margot.
How about that, Leo? Margot and Ron.

translation.en: -Right? Like a power couple. Like Rargot. -Gross.
translation.zh:
‎-是吧？就像超级情侣 简称罗格特
‎-恶心

translation.en: -We could be Rargot or Maron. -Meet me at the dock when it's done.
translation.zh:
‎-可以简称罗格特或者玛罗恩
‎-好了之后到码头找我

translation.en: Baxter will have the boat ready.
I believe this belongs to me.
Well...
I guess this is goodbye, Mathi...
Margot.
Have fun explaining this to the Feds.
-[Elise] In the chair. Both of you. -[door opens]
translation.zh: ‎你 坐下 你们俩都坐下

translation.en: -Yes, is this the police? -[door closes]
-[Elise] Yes, I-I'm calling because… -It's OK.
translation.zh:
‎-对 我报警是时因为…
‎-没事的

I mean, it's a man and a woman, and the woman is clearly the ringleader.

translation.en: Yeah, well, she has blonde hair, blue eyes.

translation.en: Um, she's wearing a sparkly, awful pink dress.
-[whistles] -And the man is… -What? -[Elise] Um, a mismatched...
No, the woman is clearly the one who's running the show. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎不是 明显是那个女的主导 对

translation.en: [whispers] Rain? Why are you doing rain? It's not--
I'm hoping you can get here quickly, because I'm not sure what to do.
translation.zh: ‎希望你们能尽快赶来 ‎我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: No, I'm just a neighbor, I saw them walking in,
translation.zh: ‎不是 我住在附近 我看见他们走进去

translation.en: I was just minding my own business…
[whispers] What hat? You need a hat?
…I would say you should bring everybody possible.
-[whispers] I got it. -[whispers] What?
[whispers] I got it.
-I got this. -[Elise] There's so many.
What are you doing?
-[Margot groans] -[Mim] Mrs. Finch!
-[Kevin] Yeah! -[Clancy] Mom!
[Mim] Oh my God. No, no, no. Oh, man!
Mom! Dad, do something!
I got it. I got it.
Honey, I-I have the gun. Want me to throw it to you?

translation.en: -Shoot her! -What? Shoot her? I...
I-I-I can't shoot a gun. I've never shot a gun before in my life!

translation.en: I could really use some help!
-[Elise yelps] -OK, OK, OK.
Oh no.
-Hey, are you OK? Are you alright? -Yeah.
Oh, I'm sorry. Sorry. [gasps] Oh my God.
-[sighs] -I killed someone. I killed somebody.
-[groaning] -[Kevin] Dad, she's moving.
-[laughs] Yeah, she's moving! -You didn't kill her!

‎-爸 你没杀人！
‎-对 她在动

‎咱们不能让利奥跑了
‎否则整件事要怪在我头上了

I can't believe you picked up that spider, Mr. Finch. That was so brave!

translation.en: Oh, I don't know about brave, Lewis. And I knew it was harmless.

‎背上还有卵囊
‎是数以百万计的毒宝宝

‎而且出现了僵尸末日

-[all] Kevin! -[groans]
Look, guys! Look, it's Leo.
-[Ron] There he is! -[engine revving]
-[engine starts] -[Kevin] My God, Mom!
We got it. Come on, get in!
-Hey, honey! -Yeah?
-Leo was wrong about one thing. -What?

‎-利奥有一件事说对了
‎-什么事？

You got this!
[Ron] Let's save our family.

-Heated seats! -[Margot] Belts on.
Nice, this is so nice.

-[Mim] No! Mr. Finch! -The adrenaline pumping.

Oh, wow, this handles great!
Oh! This thing's got some pickup!
[sings] Limited edition!

-Dad, I have an idea. -What?

-[Mim screams] -Oh, man!
[Mim screams] What is happening?

That was us!
-That was us. -We'll leave a note.
OK. Here we go. I got him.

We are all going to die.
-Roll down the window. I have an idea! -What? OK.

‎-亲爱的 摇下车窗

‎-好的

Leo! You wanna dance with the minivan, man?

What?
[Ron] Everybody's OK? OK.

Leo!
I got him, honey. I got him.
Oh, any excuse to whip out the guns, right?

[groans] Why are your fingers so freakishly strong?

translation.en: -Dude. -[laughs]
-Dude! -We did it!
Don't mess with a pastry chef, or his family,

translation.en: 'cause you will get the hammer!
Yeah! You meatball!
[Margot] You're my daughter alright.

translation.en: And then he told us that he's a bad guy and not the good guy.

translation.en: -[in high voice] What? -Yeah, basically, Leo...
So... wow.
Wow. You certainly had an exciting life.
-Before me. -Yeah.
You know, you, you...
You and me, we were always…
I mean, I always knew you were out of my league, but now I get it.

‎我早就知道我配不上你
‎不过现在我明白了

translation.en: I was your cover.
Right?
-This life we built-- -Honey, we are real.

‎-咱们一起建立的生活…
‎-亲爱的 我们是真的

translation.en: -We are? -Yeah.
Of course this is real.
Yeah, no, I thought, I mean, I thought so.
I love you, and I love our family.
Mr. and Mrs. Finch, my mom and dad are gonna pick me up at eight o'clock.

‎芬奇先生和芬奇太太
‎我爸妈八点会来接我

-[Ron] Sugar balls. -[Margot] Yeah.
-Henry! -[Ron] Henry!
Henry, we're comin' to you.
[Ron] Well, well, well.
Old roommate Henry from University of Nebraska.

Hope there's no hard feelings.
You know, you were kind of a hero tonight.
Seriously. You totally saved us with the whole fake kid band story.

‎真的 你编了儿童乐团那个故事
‎把我们都救了

‎-对 不过也不算什么啦
‎-不 很厉害 凯文

Oh my God.
This was literally the craziest night we are ever going to live...

translation.en: and I didn't post any of it.
Waste.
I'm sorry. I've been kinda mean lately.

Jealous of me?

not care what anyone thinks.
I wish I could be more like that.

‎-谢谢 你是个很棒的姐姐

I wanna go to Boston.
I want to apply to the Berklee School of Music Summer Program.

translation.en: And I know what you're gonna say.
I'm too young, I can't stay in the city by myself--

‎你要说我太小了
‎不能一个人住在城里

translation.en: Yes.
Y-Yes what?
Henry, I'm going through your files, OK?
translation.zh: ‎亨利 我看一下你的文件 好吗？

Not just a musician. You were a cellist.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Wow.
The Pescatrici Quartet wasn't just a crime syndicate.
translation.zh: ‎渔妇四人组不光是犯罪团伙

translation.en: How do you think we got into those fancy events?
translation.zh:
‎你以为我们
‎怎么进得了这些盛大的活动？

translation.en: Berklee's one of the best programs in the world, and you're ready for it.
translation.zh: ‎伯克利是全世界最好的学校之一 ‎而且你已经准备好了

translation.en: -[laughs] Wait, for real? -You're a fantastic cellist.
I happen to know a thing or two about that subject.
I happen to know absolutely nothing about that subject.
But I do agree with your mom.
You are fantastic.
[Margot] You're going to Boston.
It's time.
This mean I get a phone, too?

translation.en: -Yeah, sure. -No.
Oh, no.
-Y-Yeah. -Yeah. OK.
-[Mim] To Boston! -[giggles]
Hey.
Hi.

[Travis] How was the swim?
-Awful. Yeah. -[laughs]
Well, it was a really nice jump.
-Is that the senior? -[Clancy] Glad to see you're not in jail.

‎-那个高三学生？
‎-很高兴你没进监狱 ‎-那个高三学生
‎-对 没进监狱

‎-对 没进监狱 ‎对 嗯

‎没事吧？

‎没事吧？ ‎嗯 都很好 好极了

Yeah, we're just watering the flowers.
-No. -Uh-oh.

and I think I know what it is.
Mrs. Patoc, I can explain--

translation.en: Mom, I don't need 'em anymore.
Awesome sleepover.
Totally.
Yeah!
-[Mrs. Patoc] Thanks for everything. -[Mim] Yep.

‎再一次表示感谢 ‎-没事 应该的
‎-再来玩哦

translation.en: -[Ron] Anytime. -We should do it again sometime.

‎-没事 应该的
‎-再来玩哦 ‎以后再来

translation.en: -Nope. -Or not.
-[all] Bye! -[Lewis] Thanks, Mr. Finch.

‎再见 ‎-谢谢 芬奇先生
‎-再见

translation.en: -OK. -Take care.
-[sighs] -That's it, right? We can get back to our normal lives now, right?

‎这就结束了 是吧？
‎咱们可以回到正常生活了吧？

translation.en: Probably.
Probably?
-Probably? -[Margot sighs] Gotta get these shoes off.
[Ron] OK, take them off, then can you answer the question?

‎好的 鞋脱掉
‎然后能回答一下问题吗？

‎-我回答了
‎-你说大概 也就是说…

‎-我知道
